name: Toolbox
description:
Toolbox is building a better future of work for the 9M skilled construction workers earning over $300B in wages. Through our worker-centric labor marketplace, construction workers can showcase their background, secure full-time jobs, reduce their downtime through short-term gigs, and access basic financial services.

Construction workers get access to a mobile app to highlight their professional experience, keep track of their licenses and certifications, secure jobs and on-demand gigs. and can access direct, online payments for their work. 

Contractors and building owners can use our platform to reduce project delays by securing experienced tradespeople and skilled laborers for their projects.

name: Future Fields
description:
We make the most important ingredient for lab grown meat - cell culture media. We make cell culture media 1000 times cheaper than anyone else through our novel production system.

Future Fields started out as a lab grown meat company, focusing on chicken products. We developed our first prototype using cell culture media available on the market today. With this, the price of our chicken was $3000 US per lb. Would you buy a really good chicken nugget for $300? Probably not. 

We prioritized overcoming this hurdle first, and we were successful! We developed an entirely new way of producing growth factors - which are the key (and most expensive) component of cell culture media. We realized this technology could solve the same problem all lab grown meat companies face. 

Given our mission to singlehandedly kickstart the next agricultural revolution, we decided to pivot and focus on enabling the entire industry to succeed. Our cell culture media is affordable, scalable, and fully customizable to meet the specific needs of individual cell lines, from pork to kangaroo, and everything in between.

name: Todos Comemos
description:
TodosComemos is a marketplace where you can buy premade meal ingredients that transform the way you cook. We seek that our users save time and stress, while being able to prepare lots of new dishes in simple steps.

Serving over 15 hundred homes in Bogota and Ciudad de Mexico, we are growing 2x every month in revenue in an overlooked market. 

We eliminate traditional intermediaries and long cooking experiences, connecting food production centers (and their pre-made meal ingredients) directly with customers.

name: Flat
description:
We provide instant offers to home sellers, saving them dozens of visits and time and resources they need to spend to sell a home.
We then renovate the home and sell it with guarantees that nobody else in the market offers: 30 day buyback guarantee, 6 months of
assistance and property insurance, 200+ inspection points, a smooth legal process, help with obtaining a mortgage.

name: ChatPay
description:
ChatPay lets anyone who has built an online community monetize it with WhatsApp groups. For example a fitness coach can charge her followers to join an exclusive group where they can message her directly and receive special content.

Many creators, talented people or influencers are using WhatsApp and Telegram groups to create exclusive communities where they share unique insights, post special content, and host entire coaching programs. To materialize this, they go through a very fragmented and manual effort to process payments and add each member to the group. ChatPay is the complete solution to create a paid community on an instant-messaging group.

name: Inspectify
description: Inspectify is a marketplace where you can quickly find, schedule and book home inspections. When buying a home, instead of manually booking your home inspection and receiving a 100 page static PDF report, you book quickly on Inspectify and receive a dynamic HTML report where you can review repair estimates, find contractors and quickly move through the home closing process.

name: Reflect
description: Reflect is a no-code tool for automated website testing. Instead of building and maintaining complex Selenium tests, companies use Reflect to run automated end-to-end tests without writing code.

name: Rally
description: Rally is a video conferencing platform enabling multiple conversations in parallel. You no longer have to take turns to speak and you can hop in and out of conversations with a click. This is perfect for happy hours, networking, and other social gatherings. We are being used by institutions like MasterCard, Harvard and a multitude of startups across North America.

name: Glimpse
description: Glimpse provides a new marketing and sales channel for brands through product placements in Airbnbs - currently partnered with over 1,500 properties. With Glimpse, a brand can place their products in targeted locations for guests to try and purchase and can attribute follow-on sales from the specific Airbnb. Our properties are vetted super hosts and have an average of 50-100 bookings annually. From Glimpse, they receive commissions for follow-on sales. By working with Glimpse, we enable a brand to use short-term rentals as showrooms in any target market without the labor or infrastructure costs.

name: Lendtable
description:
1 in 4 Americans do not get their full 401(k) match. That means 25 million workers are leaving $24 billion on the table in free employer contributions. The primary reason these workers cannot get their match is because they do not have enough to both cover living expenses and invest. 

Lendtable helps workers get thousands in additional income by giving them a cash advance to cover their living expenses so they can finally begin earning their employer match. Once their money has vested we take some of the match money earned in order to cover our expenses. 

Workers now have thousands of dollars more without putting any money down, and we make money helping them do so -- we win if they win.

name: Afriex
description: Afriex app makes it super easy for immigrants to send money home. They do this by leveraging blockchain technology to make transfers faster and cheaper than banks or other transfer services

name: Together Video Chat
description: Together is a video calling app specifically designed for children to interact with their long distance grandparents or traveling parents. The app offers playful and educational activities to help create an emotional bond despite the distance.

name: Supabase
description:
Supabase preempts scalability problems. We have taken Postgres, the best database for scaling, and made it the easiest database to use. This makes Supabase the default choice from the start.

Supabase fixes four imminent pains for developers and businesses: availability, usability, cost, and lock-in. We extend Postgres with instant APIs, auto-generating documentation, and event-driven automations. And we make growing easy with one-click autoscaling.

name: Sidekick
description: If your team is remote, but you want the closest possible experience to working together in-person - email us and we'll set you up with Sidekicks within a week.

name: OneKey
description:
OneKey is solving the pain & inefficiency of working on mobile.

We put all your work apps into the 1 thing you use the most one your phone -- your keyboard.

You can schedule meetings, update CRM, & more in 1 click, without leaving the messaging apps you are in (Gmail, iMessage, Linkedin, etc..)

We make scheduling meetings as easy as sending emojis

name: Jika
description: Jika helps Shopify sellers A/B test their product pricing so they can make more money.

name: Virtually
description:
We help build and scale online bootcamps and/or career accelerators. 

A modern, fully-customizable solution for teaching online. Admissions, live conferencing, payment-processing, and student management brought together in one place.

name: Kingdom Supercultures
description: Kingdom Supercultures makes it easy for food manufacturers to create exciting new foods.  We design microbial cultures that produce 0-calorie fermented sodas, beers with entirely new flavors, and novel flavorings for plant-based meats.

name: Decentro
description:
Almost every company that has to integrate with the legacy financial institutions, faces several challenges when it comes to the product cycle. Not only are the APIs and documentations less available, but they are also old school and ridden with errors and loopholes. 

On top of that, the lack of a single point of contact from the underlying institutions, makes the already long integration cycle of 5 months feel like a temple run between different departments. And since those services break and update over time, you can imagine the nightmare in terms of coordination between the tech teams. 

We are a full-stack platform where you can come, select your desired modules, play in the sandbox, and launch your product with the APIs and SDKs within a couple of weeks! Not only that, but we also take care of all upcoming fixes, iterations, and updates without breaking any flow.

It's that easy, as it should be. Welcome to the future.

name: isibit
description: The all-in-one platform for business travel in Latam. We align the incentives of companies and travellers to spend more efficiently being able to create savings up to 35% below travel policy, in addition, to improve the experience and safety for everyone involved through technology.

name: Justo
description:
At Justo, which means “fair” in Spanish, we aim to give restaurant owners access to technology that will help them increase their sales, at a more fair price. We provide restaurants their own online store, we teach them about advertising and marketing and we automate the process for them. We also offer last-mile delivery service.

Currently we’ve surpassed 500,000 orders in Chile and we are launching in Mexico this month.

Our goal is to create a service that is profitable for restaurants and for us.

https://files.getjusto.com/app/images/demos.gif

name: Yotta Savings
description: Users save money, get over 2x the national average in interest and weekly chances to win additional prizes up to $10 million through weekly random number drawings.

name: Daybreak Health
description: We offer online counseling services designed for teens.  Our licensed counselors provide science-backed programs to teenagers through video and text messaging on our mobile app.

name: MarketForce 360
description:
MarketForce 360 is enabling FMCG companies to manage their field sales activities and grow their distribution channels in Africa. 

Today, 90% of retail transactions occur through informal channels, with millions of corner shops and field sales agents acting as the first point of contact between retailers and brands. 

With MarketForce 360's mobile app, sales agents record sales activities as they happen, including orders, visits, deliveries, payments, and feedback. The data is then visible in real-time to manufacturers, distributors, and financial service providers, enabling them to monitor and optimize their sales and distribution channels across agents, shops, and regions.

MarketForce 360 is already enabling trade across 50,000+ retailers, and $200 million in transactions have been processed through the platform to date. We recently raised $500,000 in seed funding from ViKtoria Ventures, EchoVC Partners, P1 Ventures, Ventures Platform and a group of strong angel investors.

name: TANGObuilder
description: Today the building design process is cumbersome. Architects submit their conceptual design to structural engineers for validation, a process that typically takes about 4 weeks to receive initial feedback. This is followed by extensive back and forth discussion with many barriers in the communication process. TANGObuilder generates the building structural design in real-time, streamlines the communication process, and drastically improves the lead time for architects to receive feedback and have a validated design.

name: BukuWarung
description:
BukuWarung's vision is to empower 60 million micro-merchants in Indonesia to become financially aware and enable them to manage and grow their business using our technology platform starting with digital bookkeeping and payments.

BukuWarung is an accounting app that helps small and micro businesses to manage their cash and credit transactions. Merchants receive 3x faster repayments and see increased cash flow due to the automatic payment reminders sent by the app. The app tracks all transactions including credit, expense and sales, and helps merchants get cash flow visibility through business reports.

BukuWarung raised its back to back Pre-A and Seed funding rounds in 2020 led by Quona Capital, East Ventures. AC Ventures, Golden Gate Ventures, Tanglin Venture Partners and Michael Sampoerna joined the round along with strategic angel investors from Grab, Gojek, Flipkart, PayPal, Airbnb, Snapdeal, Xendit, Rapyd, Mastercard, Funding Societies and others.

name: Charityvest
description:
We're building a zero-fee charitable payments platform. Our first product is Charityvest, a free charitable giving fund for any and every donor.
- Commit to give to charity by making tax-deductible contributions to your fund.
- Send donations to any charity, or share giving gifts with others, from your fund.
- Receive one tax receipt for all the giving you do.
- Zero fees. Your charities receive 100% of your donation.

Start giving freely by opening your free Charityvest fund at Charityvest.org.

name: Kuleana
description: Creating plant-based seafood which is enhanced through biotechnology. We are on route to create products to mimic and even pass existing animal options in terms of taste and texture. Our first product is raw tuna.

name: Strive School
description: In exchange for a part of their future salary, select students can become professional-grade software engineers through a six-month online program. While the majority of universities in Europe are free to attend, STEM courses are often outdated and theoretical; Strive School works with those pursuing STEM fields to help them become job-ready software engineers.

name: Volopay
description:
Volopay is a modern spend management platform that saves companies time and money by giving visibility & control to every aspect of business spending. With Volopay, finance and accounting teams can control expense requests and approvals, make bill payments (domestic/cross-border), manage company cards, and reconcile all accounting on one platform.

Volopay completely eliminates the need for expense reports and reimbursements while giving everyone in the company a card to use. We worked in an offshore dev centre in the past and it took 2 months to get our reimbursements and 4 weeks to make any purchase as there was just one corporate card for the entire company and clunky bill payments solutions offered by the banks. 

Among our customers are Reddoorz (OYO of South East Asia), Dathena (biggest data security co in Singapore) and Beam (APAC’s leading micro-mobility player).

name: Conta Simples
description: Conta Simples is a digital bank account for SMEs in Brazil. We help them manage their payments, offering a complete solution with multiple corporate cards and financial tools. With Conta Simples, in a few clicks you can run your company’s finance.

name: QuestDB
description:
QuestDB is an open source SQL database designed to process time-series data, faster. QuestDB’s software architecture has been designed from the ground up to be as close to the hardware structure as possible - offering breakthrough performance. 

Through QuestDB, companies can harness the power of real-time and big data processing by handling billions of time-stamped events without relying on powerful hardware.

name: Drip
description: Drip is the only piece of software a restaurant needs to run their business. We offer point of sale, payroll, HR, in-house delivery, and more to the 100,000 counter service restaurants in the US.

name: Ribbon
description: We automate virtual ticketing, event websites, customer communication and anything else you may need to host online classes, events, and courses. You can also sell your recorded content.

name: Depict.ai
description: Providing product recommender systems to e-commerce stores with 5000+ products. We give customers an extremely risk-free and frictionless way to test the value of our solution.

name: Carupi
description:
Carupi is a managed P2P marketplace for used cars, very similar to Airbnb, reinventing the archaic experience of things such as Craigslist or car dealers through a transparent, easy and safe platform, similar to what Airbnb did to home rentals.

----

Carupi is a new app, where consumers can buy and sell cars with the push of a button. It is a managed peer-to-peer marketplace for used cars, very similar to Airbnb, that is reinventing the archaic experience of things such as Craigslist or car dealers through a transparent, easy, fair and safe platform, similar to what Airbnb did to home rentals.

The problem with car selling is that you only have two bad options: (i) if you sell to consumers, you don't know how to take car photos, where or how to properly advertise the car, or perhaps you want to advertise in too many places and managing this is complex and then you feel unsafe when meeting strangers, handling title transfer paperwork and to get paid; or (i) you can sell to dealers or "instant-cash offer" startups which give you bad prices since they need high margins to cover their high inventory and fixed costs. 

And car buying is equally bad: (i) you can buy from consumers on classifieds websites and face a terrible experience since meeting strangers is unsafe, there are a lot of scammers in these places not to mention that you may end up buying a lemon or not knowing how to handle paperwork and payment; or (ii) you can buy from dealers who are not well-intentioned and will hide problems because they are negotiating a one-off transaction.

Carupi, like Airbnb, manages the entire end-end transaction from taking photos, managing offers, facilitating test-drives, handling bureaucracy and payment and delivering the car to the buyer - all of that with contractors that are paid per job. 

During the transaction neither buyer nor the seller ever talk to each other or have to worry about safety. And while sellers get the best private-party values on their cars, buyers get fully certified cars for at-home test drives and after purchase.

The founder has previously started the largest consumer-to-business car marketplace in Brazil, leading it to $100M GMV, raising $30M. He is an electrical engineer undergrad with background at McKinsey, Goldman Sachs and MIT (GPA 5.0/5.0).

name: Ochre Bio
description:
Many donor livers are too unhealthy or damaged to be transplanted and so go to waste, even though one in six patients die waiting for a new liver. The main reason for discarding a donor liver is that it contains too much fat. We rejuvenate these fatty donor livers by directly targeting over-active genes, making these livers transplantable. 

We use recent breakthroughs in genomics to find and shut down over-active genes driving disease, and then go straight to testing our therapies in discarded donor livers that we keep alive on a machine. This approach makes us better, cheaper, and faster than traditional drug discovery.

name: Jenfi
description:
We lend to small businesses based on revenue. 

Over 99% of businesses in Asia are small businesses. Many of these businesses are highly "bankable" yet 50-70% are unable to obtain a loan.

Having been business owners ourselves, we experienced firsthand the struggles of funding a business - from expensive equity options to loans that required personal guarantees.

We went live in Singapore first to validate the product/market fit. We plan to expand across the APAC region..

Our sweet spot is backing repeatable business spend - expenses that leads to increased revenue. Our financing product allows businesses to keep growing with us over time. Over 25% of our loans today are from repeat borrowers.

We created a brand new asset class in Asia - offering flexible repayment options, such as tieing repayment with sales. Business owners LOVE this.

Our automated financial technology platform ingests revenue and alternative data sources that gives us a proprietary edge in understanding the behavior of our borrowers. As we collect continuous data, we are able to offer better financial and technology solutions, while mitigating our downside risk.

Funds are seamlessly deployed via our virtual Jenfi Wallet and MasterCard solution, giving borrowers flexibility to make payments while giving Jenfi real-time tracking of their spend.

Recent coverage: 
https://techcrunch.com/2020/02/03/jenfi-wants-to-solve-small-business-lending-in-southeast-asia/

name: Legionfarm
description:
LegionFarm lets gamers pay to play with professional players, helping customers have more fun playing, learn to be a better gamer, and conquer difficult parts of video games.

Legionfarm Pros want to monetize their skills by turning their hobbies into real careers. They are the top 1% of players. They have a massive impact on the success of gaming companies - and we want to allow these top players to hold their dream jobs in virtual worlds.

Over the past year, Legionfarm organized over 400,000 gaming sessions with our 7,000 Pros.

Legionfarm provides access to unique entertainment on a global scale while creating new jobs in virtual worlds at the same time

name: Menten AI
description: Menten AI designs protein drugs and enzymes using quantum computing and machine learning. Their technology leapfrogs current computational methods making it possible to design previously intractable proteins. The team created the first protein design algorithm for current and near-term quantum computers and created the world’s first protein designed on a quantum computer. They are now working on 3 new proteins, including a peptide to prevent the spread of viruses like Covid-19. They have 2 paid pilot projects with multinational chemical companies and 4 LOI’s with pharma and biotech companies.

name: Belvo
description:
We are Belvo, a financial API platform for Latam that enables any company or developer to access and interpret their end-users' financial information, through one easy-to-use API. Think Plaid for Latam.

Our vision is to power the next generation of financial services in Latam by enabling more inclusive, efficient and empowering offerings through tech and data. Latam is a very exciting and dynamic place to be right now and a great place to build infrastructure for the next generation of financial products for a huge market.

name: Equator Therapeutics
description:
We are developing a drug to increase metabolism and burn calories without exercise.

Obesity and type 2 diabetes have reached epidemic proportions. There are 2.2B overweight people and 500M people with type 2 diabetes worldwide, and these numbers increase drastically every year. Existing drugs are not effective enough to reverse the trend. Our drug can solve this problem, because it addresses the root cause of metabolic disorders – the imbalance between caloric intake and expenditure.

Our drug will target mitochondria – the powerhouse of the cell – to generate heat. This approach has been proven to fully reverse obesity and type 2 diabetes in animals. However, therapeutic application for humans was impossible, because mitochondrial heat production could only be induced by highly artificial methods with side effects. This changed after our recent breakthrough discovery of the protein that mitochondria naturally use to generate heat. We have developed a unique high-throughput drug discovery platform to identify compounds that selectively activate this target protein, without side effects.

For decades people have wanted a drug that burns calories like exercise does. We are realizing this dream at Equator Therapeutics.

name: Humanly
description:
Humanly automates job candidate screening for companies with high applicant volume. Candidates access Humanly on companies’ career pages, job boards and social media. Candidates then answer a set of screening questions to determine their role-fit, qualification, and the predicted impact they’ll make in the role through a dynamic, mobile-friendly conversation with Humanly.

Humanly is at $14K MRR across 16 customers including Farmers Insurance, Feather, Grin and BPM and are in security review with Moss Adams and Costco. The company has grown 100% since February 1st. 

On average companies spend 64 hours screening and scheduling candidates, per open role. Humanly's software automates consistent screening, schedules candidates, removes bias, and goes beyond the resume in understanding the qualifications of a candidate. Candidates rate Humanly's experience 4.9/5.

name: WorkPay
description: WorkPay provides SMBs in Africa for tools for time tracking, payroll processing and salary disbursement to banks and mobile wallets.

name: Dataline
description: Dataline.io is a unified data hub for marketing and internal company data with strong privacy primitives. Unlike other players that connect marketing data to other marketing systems, Dataline sits inside a customer's environment and creates their own first-party data set. This enables easier GDPR / CCPA compliance, full control over data for enterprises, while having a concerted view of their customers.

name: LabGrid
description: LabGrid makes browser-first tools for biotech. We enable high-throughput science by handling data analysis for plate-based experiments. Scientists can merge, analyze and share data and protocols in-browser, helping them work faster and more confidently with their teams.

name: SEND
description:
SEND is a digital freight forwarder and customs broker for Africa.
We manage the entire process of shipping cargo by air or by sea, including the documentation, customs process, delivery to the warehouse and trade financing.

name: 99minutos
description:
Last mile delivery for ecommerce in Mexico and Chile
Buy online and receive it in less than 99 minutes, same day, next day or choose our new green delivery with zero emissions,
You buy we deliver, with 19 cities in Mexico already operating and growing. 
Flat rate, live tracking, flexible routes and plugins for every ecommerce

name: Dropee
description:
Our mission is to help local independent retailers find their best-sellers investors by matching them with the right supplier and brands.

We believe that today's evolution of the wholesale industry has stifled the growth of many SME businesses. The supply-chain in Malaysia and across Southeast Asia lacks meaningful real-time connectivity between suppliers and retailers. Hence we are determined to transform this industry by providing businesses the right tools to grow.

Our modern, digital approach to the wholesale industry allows retailers to discover, purchase, and manage inventories for their store - all on a single marketplace platform. And our software tool for suppliers helps businesses to deal with all the pain points of growing customer database, from ordering to payments.

With our data-driven approach, we connects local, independent retailers with the right brands, distributors, and wholesalers to stock their store with the best products. This saves retailers and suppliers time and money, allowing them to focus on what's most important: building and running their business.

Dropee is headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.

name: Healthlane
description:
Healthlane is an app that enables 1.3B Africans to access modern online and offline healthcare services. Today we offer doctor bookings, chat with your doctor and we’re about to launch prescription delivery and lab results via the app. 

In February, we achieved $51k in net revenue - growing 350% in the last 6months. 98% of annual retention of our patinets. We have a 3 month payback time after launching a new hospital. Africa has the fastest growing middle class in the world. Today there’re 3B doctor consultations per year in Africa. At our $5 price per consultation booked via Healthlane, that’s a $15B market opportunity.

Before Healthlane, Dr Agbor and Alain have been consultants on digital health for Bill Gates health org (GAVI), United Nations, WHO and the World Bank. We’ve previously built and sold software to hospitals across Africa.

name: Stable
description:
📬 Stable is a virtual address & mailroom for startups, and the only solution on the market that guides you through switching your business address compliantly

- 🏢 1 permanent business address for all of your company documents and mail
- 👩‍🏫 Guidance on compliantly switching your address with the IRS, state, banks, payroll, etc
- 📨 Open, view, forward, and shred your mail securely without physically entering a mailroom
- ⚡ Integrations with the tools you love to use (Slack, Dropbox, Drive, etc)
- 💻 Modern platform with encrypted file storage, optical character recognition, and more

name: GiveAway
description: We help to get rid of the things in your house that are no longer needed without spending any time or money.Our users bid on your items with virtual coins and can often find great products up to 95% off.

name: GuruHotel
description:
[GuruHotel](https://guruhotel.com/) is Shopify for the hotel industry. Independent hotels use our software to rebuild their hotel website, drive more direct bookings from online travel agencies (OTAs), and generate 30% more revenue. 

In 8 months since launch, we already have $20k monthly revenue, growing 48% MoM, with 26 hotels and 582 rooms on the platform.

There are over 400k independent hotels globally, and we generate $9k per hotel per year, which represents a $3.6B market opportunity.

We have decades of experience building products and leading companies in the hotel industry, including founding and selling LastRoom, the HotelTonight for LATAM.

That’s where we learned that 73% of people who find a hotel room on Booking.com or Expedia also check the hotel website to see if the price is cheaper.  Independent hotels are missing these opportunities because they haven’t figured out that they should offer extras, discounts, and better user experience in order to drive bookings on their websites to avoid paying 15-25% commissions to OTAs.  We help them automate all of this.

Why now - Shopify did this for e-commerce allowing them to pull their content from Amazon - we will do this for hotels allowing them to gain freedom from Booking and Expedia.

name: CrowdForce
description: CrowdForce is an app that allows any local merchant in Africa, starting with Nigeria to become a bank branch within minutes.

name: nplex biosciences
description: nplex is developing a high-throughput proteomics platform for population-wide discovery. nplex was started by bioengineers at McGill University working together to untangle some of the most difficult problems in proteomics and meet the demand of high-throughput biology. Today, nplex’s team is focusing on precision profiling the human secretome to provide a complementary and orthogonal read-out within modern drug discovery pipelines.

name: Handl
description: Handl converts documents (invoices, income stabs, custom forms, etc.)  into structured data through simple API. 100% automation implies no need for any supervision/manual work on your side and allows you to reduce costs, improve response time, and operate accurate data. Powered by the merge of ML/AI + humans-in-the-loop to work in real-time even for the most complicated cases

name: Checkars
description: Checkars removes the hassle and lack of trust from used-car transactions. With over 1000 transactions in first 18 months and NPS >85, we are confident we are offering customer the best possible experience to buy or finance a car.

name: Zynq
description: We're a calendar tool that automatically picks the best time & room for meetings. This boosts productivity for employees and frees up meeting room use by 50%.

name: Sayana
description: Sayana is a mental wellness app that helps people track their thoughts and feelings daily, get relevant tips on how to cope with emotions, and match with people in a similar life situation.

name: Stark Bank
description: Bank for tech companies in Brazil

name: Termii
description:
Termii is a communications platform that allows African businesses send messages to anyone across sms, email, voice and instant messaging channels. With Termii businesses can;

1. Verify customer identity & transactions
2. Send product notifications to customers
3. Generate personality and engagement insights from customer transactions

name: Fondeadora
description:
Fondeadora is the digital alternative to the traditional Mexican banking system. We know that the current system is broken and we want to fix it. Our mission is to free people from their banks by giving them back control over their money. We want to serve the 54 million Mexicans who are unhappy with their current banks and the 65 million of Mexicans who currently do not have a bank account.

Our first product is a mobile banking app and an international Mastercard debit card so you can spend, store and move your money seamlessly, completely fee-free.

Join us in this magical mystical ride.

name: Moons
description: Moons manufactures and sells orthodontic clear aligners in LATAM. Our focus is on providing excellent patient service whilst keeping prices accessible - we can do this because we make the aligners ourselves in our dental laboratory and sell the aligners exclusively in our own clinics

name: Valienta
description: There is an inefficient channel, where there are 13 million saleswomen that go through a lot of frictions to sell their products, like having to use multiple tech tools and to comply with the policies of each company, and there are companies who are trying to sell more but don't have the tech and/or the salesforce to activate this channel. We created a marketplace that makes that more efficient.

name: Bamboo
description:
Bamboo is the first online brokerage service that gives wealthy Africans and their wealth managers direct access to the US and global securities. We’re building Fidelity for the African continent.
For wealthy Africans and their asset managers, investing in the global capital markets is cumbersome, expensive and practically inaccessible. In Nigeria, Africa's largest economy and home to 30% of all the wealth in Sub Saharan Africa (excluding South Africa), 99.99% of the investing population do not have access to invest globally. Even for the 0.01%, if you wanted to buy a US stock, you’d have to call your asset manager who would then call an international broker to execute a trade. This is inefficient & expensive!
We have a mobile app that allows individuals trade the US stock markets by themselves and a brokerage tool for asset managers to execute trades directly & manage multilple portfolios seamlessly.

name: ElectroNeek
description: ElectroNeek is an end-to-end intelligent automation platform that lets business users with no prior IT skills analyze employee productivity, discover automation opportunities and build software robots to automate repetitive tasks.

name: SOMATIC
description: Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CLKC4gYsDLA

name: delt.ai
description: delt.ai is building the first digital bank for businesses in Latam, set to tackle the +450B Market of business deposits in Mexico. delt.ai is a natively digital alternative to a bank, born with API integrations. Its truly digital KYC-compliant onboarding allowed us to be the first opening first branchless accounts in the country. We target poorly served SMEs and Freelancers therefore focusing on the ~40B market opportunity that are profitable when served fully online.

name: Viya
description: We make living in city centers affordable in LATAM. We offer room and apartment leases paired with seamless services (cleaning, maintenance, laundry, dry cleaning) to make our tenant's lives less hectic. With a current MRR at $60k growing 20% weekly for last 3 months with margins tracking 40%. Team is from MIT with background in real estate looking to improve rental experience for tenants and owners with technology.

name: Oda
description: Oda streamlines access to residential real estate transactions through a new data infrastructure. We enable real estate investors and startups to identify and manage opportunities quickly and conveniently. Standardized and up-to-date listings of all markets in a single platform.

name: Breathe Well-being
description:
Breathe Well-being helps people prevent or manage chronic lifestyle diseases by losing weight through its digital therapeutics program (weight-loss clinic in a cloud, think Noom for India). The program is delivered remotely over the phone and through the mobile app, therefore users are able to follow the lifestyle program from the convenience of their home. Our online program is 3X more effective at 1/4th the cost.

The user receives bi-weekly 1-1 coaching focused on behavioral changes, online community for support and motivation, and a mobile app that provides educational lessons, lifestyle tracking tools and weekly challenges (gamification). The content and behavioral change techniques are centred around healthy diet, fitness, lifestyle and stress reduction.

Our unique coaching methodology employs cognitive behavioral therapy (CBT), goal-oriented treatment and self-efficacy enhancement. The coach helps the user bust negative emotions of past failures in weight-loss and increase motivation by linking short-term achievable goals with the user's personal values. Through the program, the user is able to self-identify triggers of unhealthy habit adoption and make better decisions.

Breathe Well-being has demonstrated success in helping people lose weight, build long-term healthy habits and reduce/eliminate medication for lifestyle diseases (example - Type 2 Diabetes). We are looking for ideas to improve our sales processes so that we can get users to enrol at a higher conversion rate post our 1-week free trial. We need to identify triggers when users are most likely to pay and provide them with a seamless process for paying on-the-spot.

name: Raycast
description: Raycast is a productivity tool that saves engineering teams time on non-coding tasks in apps like Jira, GitHub or Slack which might take up to 50% of a developer's day.

name: Easyplan
description:
Easyplan is a money market account for the 250M middle income Indians. Our users earn 2x bank account returns, with no fees, lock-ins or minimums. We’ve been growing 12% WoW since launch, and have 17,000 users with currently funded accounts. 

The key thing we’ve figured out is acquisition. Our cost of acquisition is 10% of the industry average. We’re building a low-cost, high-trust distribution platform with our saving product. We will use it to cross-sell credit and insurance products.

Middle-income Indians save almost 30% of their income. But <10% have invested in the market. Less than half have access to formal credit. The lack of data and distribution channels has left them underserved. 

We’re piggybacking on the rapid increase in digital payments penetration to sell tailored digital financial products directly to them. That’s a $10Bn opportunity in sales commissions alone.

name: Pahamify
description: Pahamify is an online learning platform for K-12 students in Indonesia. We provide high quality educational videos which can be used to learn various concepts ranging from math, science, social sciences, and language based on the local curriculum. We also provide thousands of practice questions and modules which can be used for college entry test preparation.

name: Zumo Labs
description:
At Zumo Labs, we use game engines to generate synthetic training data for computer vision models.

Computer vision is the essential technology that powers the products of the future: autonomous vehicles, smart retail, robotics, smart fitness, security and vision-based analytics. These algorithms require huge amounts of training data. This data is currently collected and labeled manually; a slow, imprecise, expensive process that is rife with bias and privacy issues. 

Zumo Labs solves all of these problems (and more!) by creating feature rich synthetic training data in the cloud: cheaper, faster to generate and iterate on, covers all the edge cases, and has no bias or privacy issues. 

Computer vision companies can spend 600k a year getting the data they need to power their products. This is a serviceable market of $3B which  has grown 60% per year in the last 2 years.

name: Spenny
description:
Spenny is the Acorns for India. Every time a user make any digital transaction, we round off the amount to the nearest 10 INR and invest it for them into a diversified portfolio, automatically.

400M millennials in India don't invest because they don't have enough time, knowledge or access to large capital. With Spenny, they just connect the card and invest every time they spend.

We're growing 67% WoW since launch, with 3,000+ users and $15,000 in AUM. Indians put $500Bn into their bank accounts annually. We charge 1.75% of the AUM for investments. That's a direct ~$9Bn market in India alone.

Potentially every time a user makes a transaction, we make money. And in that sense, the timing for Spenny couldn't have been better: 1 Trillion+ transactions are expected in 2021 because of factors like Whatsapp launching its P2P payments in India for its 400M users. And the emergence of UPI means every Indian has a virtual bank account now. 

More interesting revenue models develop from the transaction data insights of our users. We analyse the rich data to A) up-sell more financial products like insurance etc., and B) create brand loyalty programs & partnerships.

We acquire customers at minimal CAC by bank partnerships. We leverage the banks' existing users, by integrating with their mobile app. In turn, we invest into their mutual funds.

Our long-term vision is to become a one-stop asset management solution for millennials.

name: EduRev
description: How does EduRev Infinity work? - EduRev https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BN1pcakAvsg

name: Thunderpod
description:
Thunderpod is a social fitness app trying to solve the biggest problem we all face when it comes to fitness. You guessed it right! PROCRASTINATION (I'll start tomorrow and we all know tomorrow never comes)

Our bite-sized fitness content in the form of challenges has become a non-stop motivation for our users. These challenges are made by 250+ fitness influencers/creators on the platform.

name: yBANQ
description: We are building a collections and reconciliation platform for MSME's in India. In India, reconciliation is largely manual and error prone due requiring manual matching of bank statements with Invoices. In my last role, I used to head product for PayU, India #1 Fintech firm. I would love to connect with other Fintech founders building solving similar problems and in the neobanking space

name: Zeo Auto
description:
Zeo Auto is a route optimisation and fleet management platform. 

Our route optimisation solutions are used by drivers and independent businesses to plan multistop deliveries via Zeo Route planner app.  

The fleet management solutions are used by fleet owners having 10 - 50 fleet size. We are a device agnostic player compatible 50+ protocols covering 80% of the market. We use GPS based location tracking and OBD installations as a hook to provide an array of services and integrations that help owners save time, money and improve vehicle and team's efficiency.

Zeo Auto supports fleet managers, independent drivers and businesses in managing end to end operations right from enabling driver communication, providing ETA, route planning, trip management, vehicle tracking (speed, distance and location), waybill generation, capturing orders etc. essentially making us a lifeline for this 35B$ logistics industry.

Our solutions have been used in 50 + countries. We have enabled 15000+ deliveries via our route planner app and growing at 80% WOW.  We have enabled 6mn+ trips via our fleet management solutions across 30000 trucks.

name: Morphle
description: Microscopy Automation + Assistive Intelligence

name: TagMango
description:
TagMango is a marketplace where fans can book personalized video shoutouts from their
favourite influencers and celebrities. Like Cameo for India, imagine if your friend is a fan of
Justin Beiber, you purchase a video shoutout from Justin himself on TagMango.

It is probably the best time right now in India to convert followers into cash for 3 specific
reasons. One, digital platforms have 250mil+ MAUs, doubling YOY. Two, digital payments have
increased 55% YOY. And culturally, India has a crazy celebrity fan culture, where they’re accorded
demi-god status. From our experience as influencers in India, monetization for celebrities lack the
adequate infrastructure as opposed to in established markets.

Happy to be able to build such stable revenue streams for them.

name: PillarPlus
description: We put life into a building by designing it’s mechanical, fire, electrical, plumbing services. Architects and contractors hire consultants, who still design the building manually. Our software automates this design step and even calculates the bill of materials with project cost estimates.

name: Farm Theory
description: Farm Theory is a B2B agri-tech startup. We are bridging the gap between buyers and sellers of ugly produce by creating a farm-to-fork value chain. Ugly produce is freshly harvested fruitage that is cosmetically unappealing, hence left unsold at farms.

name: Newman's
description:
We are a consumer health tech company in Indonesia focusing on men's health, including hair loss, sexual health and smoking addiction

The issues we are addressing are often stigmatized in the region, causing embarrassment to men seeking treatment for their health. Today, patients go through a process that is (1) time-consuming (2) expensive consultation and medication (3) awkward physical consultation (4) confusion on what to do

Newman's improves patient's accessibility to doctor consultations and prescription drugs through remote consultations and improves affordability on medication by working directly with drug manufacturers.

name: Chutney
description:
We’re building Amazon for India’s mass market, the new middle class of 300m who are now coming online. Just like Amazon started with books when the US was coming online, we are starting with fresh fruits and vegetables that Indian families buy multiple times every week. 

There are over 450m Indians with access to the internet and smartphones, but only 150m of them buy online. This is because they find eCommerce apps and websites too complex to use. They also find it hard to trust an online business with no physical presence.

With Chutney, customers place their orders on Whatsapp and pick up the next day from a nearby store. All the orders are bulk shipped to the store, bringing down logistics cost.

Chutney is building a network of mom and pop stores spread across the city. Store owners share daily prices of fruits and vegetables with their customers on WhatsApp via the Chutney seller app. The app also has a simple interface for store owners to manage customer orders.

By using WhatsApp we are plugging into the existing customer behavior rather than force-fitting an app or website. Also, by partnering with mom and pop stores, we establish customer trust.

We launched 6 weeks ago in Coimbatore. We are doing over 700 orders a week amounting to $1400, growing at over 40% week on week. We are going after 60m new middle-class households, at 72 orders/year of $3 each, that is a $13b market opportunity for fresh fruits and vegetables alone.

Our vision is to build a chain of Chutney stores throughout the country, expanding across every little neighborhood and serving every need of our customers from fresh fruits and veggies to grocery and FMCG to even electronics and home appliances.

name: StayQrious
description: Imagine doing personalised workouts with a fitness coach, but for school subjects. Students log into their session that has been scheduled with their coach, they can see their learning workout for the day. Their workout typically consists of watching an interactive video, writing explanations, giving feedback to other students, making an explainer video etc. They get constant feedback and encouragement from the coach and progress only after they have understood the pre-requisites.

name: Smol Coach
description:
Smol Coach is a commerce platform for businesses which run on video. Instead of having to use multiple tools to schedule, create sessions, send video links and accept payments, Smol Coach integrates it all within a easy to use platform.

With Smol Coach, anyone can set up an online store, schedule and let clients book sessions, and sell their expertise. Smol Coach is ideal for small businesses and solo professionals.

name: Able Jobs
description: We help companies hire entry-level non-tech in areas of sales, support, and marketing talent through short-term training programs. Users download our app, go through rigorous training programs, and get interviews in our client companies.

name: goDutch
description:
goDutch is a new-age fintech app that powers group payments for millennials. We’re on a mission to reimagine group payments and enable people to enjoy with their friends without any worry of awkward reminders, delayed payments, and multiple transactions.

We've first-hand seen that group payments are very tedious - one person first pays on behalf of the entire group, then calculates and makes a note of who owes whom how much, and then individually reminds each person to pay back. At goDutch, we are passionately working towards re-imagining this multi-step process that extends over numerous days and multiple apps. Our focus is on being design-led and driving cutting-edge fintech innovation.

goDutch is founded by IIT Bombay grads with a total work experience of 10+ years in fintech and we are backed by global VC investors including Y Combinator.

name: Kosh
description: Kosh turns creditworthy blue-collar workers into micro-lenders for their community. We give them the tools and capital to give loans to their coworkers, friends and family - a segment containing 150mn potential customers.

name: DeepSource
description: DeepSource continuously analyzes source code changes to find and fix issues categorized under security, performance, anti-patterns and bug-risks. DeepSource integrates with GitHub/GitLab and runs analysis on every commit and pull request, discovers and fixes potential issues before they make it to production.

name: Upflow
description:
Upflow is SaaS tool, targeted at B2B SMBs that helps them:
1. Understand their company's financial performance, cash flows and unpaid invoices
2. Recover late, outstanding invoices by scheduling systematic chaser emails
3. Give their customers visibility into due invoices and streamline payments by seamlessly enabling new payment methods.

Upflow is used by hundreds of companies worldwide, including TripleByte and Adikteev in the US.

name: PostEra
description:
PostEra offers medicinal chemistry-as-a-service to design and synthesize molecules faster and at a lower cost. The platform uses machine learning to optimize the entire molecular design process and is more accurate than the best trained human chemists in predicting outcomes of organic reactions — which was validated in a series of academic publications, co-authored with Pfizer. The computational tools can suggest new scaffolds, predict the success of chemical reactions, and design new synthetic routes to challenging molecules. PostEra’s cloud-based platform is connected to chemistry laboratories. From this platform, biotech and pharmaceutical companies can order and synthesize compounds to help them accelerate their drug discovery campaigns. 

The founders were trained at Harvard, Yale, Oxford, and Cambridge and have published their work in leading peer-reviewed journals.

name: Skypher
description: Skypher makes security reviews easy for software companies.

name: Laserfocus
description:
Laserfocus is Superhuman for Salespeople. 
It’s the fastest way to communicate and close deals in one interface that works on top of any CRM.

We are building a web app that shows Salespeople one contact and one action step at a time by using existing business' CRM data.
We combine all communication channels in one interface to make the outreach fast, slick and more efficient.

name: SnackThis
description: Collaborative motion design tool that runs in the browser (like Figma, for motion graphics). It enables any designer to produce typographic effects for videos, animated illustrations for websites, and interface animations for apps, while collaborating effectively with marketing and product teams.

name: Cron
description: Cron is the next-gen calendar app for professionals and teams, making modern work more efficient and joyful. Our mission is to help spend time wisely through well-crafted software that streamlines workflows, integrates other productivity tools, and builds collaboration right into the core experience. In everything we do at Cron, we believe that time is our most precious resource.

name: PostHog
description: PostHog is open source product analytics, built for developers. Automate the collection of every event on your website or app, with no need to send data to 3rd parties. It's a 1 click to deploy on your own infrastructure, with full API/SQL access to the underlying data.

name: Riot Security
description: Riot sends periodically phishing emails on your team, to detect vulnerabilities, and trains them afterward. We're making tools to protect your employees, therefore protecting your company.

name: onetool
description: Onetool provides businesses with their own app-store for business software. One login, one invoice, and centralized user management. Onetool offers everything from project management software and video conferencing to document signing.

name: Refund Giant
description: Each year in the EU tourists leave $26 billion of VAT refunds unclaimed. We help tourists claim their refunds in just 15 minutes at the airport, and take 25% of every dollar they claim.

name: Candid Health
description:
Candid Health automates medical billing for healthcare providers. Our first product is an API that healthcare startups use to submit insurance claims - kind of like Stripe for medical billing.

Healthcare providers in the US spend $280B a year -- 8% of their revenue -- on medical billing. It’s one of the largest inefficiencies in the American healthcare system. The incumbents in this fragmented space are service companies that throw armies of humans at the problem. Humans may be good at tackling the outrageous complexities of medical billing, but are expensive, slow, and error-prone. We’re charging less and getting providers paid more by using data science, modern workflow automation, and machine learning to rethink medical billing from the ground up.

Today, we charge 5% of the payments we process in exchange for handling everything relating to getting paid: translating doctor’s notes into billable codes, claim submission, appealing denied claims, collecting from patients, and providing sophisticated monitoring & analysis for all of it. This positions us extraordinarily well for our long-term vision of being a complete financial hub for healthcare providers: not only handling billing, but also using billing data to better underwrite loans and AR factoring.

name: Castodia
description: Pull data from your databases and data warehouses directly into Google Sheets. Run and save queries. Auto-refresh data on a schedule, once, or every 5 mins. No more manual CSV data exports that don't refresh.

name: Stryve
description:
Recruiters waste 65 days in a year scheduling interviews - Stryve helps transform your application-to-onsite turnaround from 3 weeks to 1 day.

Stryve will be the professional network that makes text resumes obsolete. We’ve already started this by giving candidates the ability to create a public profile of their “video CV” or video pitch of themselves on our platform after they have finished submitting their private videos to the company job postings that they can host publicly anywhere online. 

If you’d like to test a demo, download Stryve on iOS or Android and use Access Code: postmates

iOS: bit.ly/stryve-ios
Android: bit.ly/stryve-android

name: Art in Res
description:
If you’re new to art collecting, or just looking to fill blank walls at your home or office, Art in Res makes it super easy to get started.

* Gallery-quality art from a curated roster of independent artists.
* We deliver and install the artwork for you - no fuss.
* Pay in monthly installments - three words: cash flow, baby.
* Invest in real art, not disposable home-goods crap. You will see and feel the difference.

name: Vori
description: Vori makes ordering dead simple for local supermarkets with a streamlines mobile wholesale marketplace where grocers can order for any department of their store--from dairy to dry goods to alcohol.

name: Cotter
description: Cotter is a passwordless authentication service that allows you to add a one-tap login in your website and apps in less than 15 minutes. Quickly enable sign-in with email, phone, or with a prompt to users' devices for a fast and frictionless authentication experience.

name: Savvy
description:
Savvy is solving one of the fundamental issues with US healthcare - employer-sponsored health insurance. When health insurance is managed by employers its bad for employers, bad for employees, and bad for the entire healthcare system.

Countless health and policy experts identify this as one of the "original sins" of the dysfunctional US healthcare system. For the first time in US history, new regulations allow companies to offer tax-advantaged health budgets to employees instead of pre-selecting health benefits packages. Savvy is building the first benefits platform to facilitate this new way of offering health benefits.

name: Release
description: Release delivers staging environments as a service. With Release a staging environment is automatically generated with every Pull Request which removes the bottleneck most companies have when they only have a single staging environment.

name: Welcome
description: Welcome lets you create virtual events that feel like an Apple Keynote.

name: Trustle
description:
Trustle is a service that gives parents access to a dedicated, on-demand expert in early childhood development who gives parents advice, information, coaching and emotional support via in-app text messaging, voice and video calling.  

We are creating a new, complementary system to the pediatric healthcare system--one that focuses on a child’s cognitive development, including their social, emotional, behavioral and academic growth. The service will help families proactively create the right environment for their child, as well as reactively provide ‘treatment’ when there are issues, big and small.

We can dramatically increase the efficiency and effectiveness of this support by routing all tasks through conversational AI before they pass to the two human experts. This will allow the high-touch support that is currently only available to the wealthiest to become available to many more, while building a highly profitable business.

Eventually, we will offer this intelligent parent relationship and communication management software to other parent service providers, for example: pediatric offices, schools, community groups, and home visitation programs. 

Our mission is to ensure that all parents have access to a completely new system of support that creates the right environment for their child’s unique developmental needs.

name: Multiverse
description:
Multiverse is a web-based game creation system inspired by Dungeons & Dragons and Roblox with a marketplace for assets from A-list creators. We've already partnered with several prominent creators who have millions of followers and millions in revenue, and they're bringing their audiences to Multiverse. We charge 30-60% of those sales based on how much we help the creators make the content.

Check out our [gameplay trailer here](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1rPwwhw03HO7uda_YDXBfKfvCZ_fHV795/view?usp=sharing).

The best way to get Multiverse is to play it. If you're into games, creativity and representation, hit us up and we'll play with you.

name: Dropprint Genomics
description:
Who we are?
We write software that understands the activity of individual cells as opposed to all cells. This approach is novel because we are no longer looking at average signals and can be precise. It is like a police person trying to identify the speeding car, they won’t find it if they look at all the cars at once, rather they need to look at the speed of each individual car. This is the beauty of single cell genomics, we can now identify that speeding car.

Why now?
The biggest barrier for entry into the single cell genomics market are cost and data analysis. To that end, we have reduced the cost by 10-fold and built the computational infrastructure for scalability. Although single cell sequencing has only been around for about five years, we come from one of the top single cell genomics labs and were the first to process and analyze millions of immune cells. Thanks to our software solutions, we have been able to bring big data solutions to the immune system.

Where are we and where are we going?
We have generated a database of over 1 million immune cells spanning healthy, cancerous, and autoimmune immune cells and are growing through paid partnerships. Harnessing out database and ML software, we can take a data-centric approach for better target discovery. Fortunately, as our database continues to grow, our models will continue to learn for more precise, unbiased, and automated single cell genomics.

Thank you!

name: Turing Labs Inc.
description: Developing a consumer product like Dove is complex, time-consuming, and expensive; companies like Unilever analyzes millions of data points to develop a blockbuster consumer product. Turing makes this process 10x more efficient. Turing's AI harnesses the data from several sources and helps to make a better decision about product development 10x faster.

name: Altay Therapeutics
description:
Altay develops small molecule drugs to treat chronic liver diseases like liver fibrosis and liver cancer.  Our co-founder Dr. Osman Ozes, led the first drug development program for Esbriet (Pirfenidone), resulting in the first FDA approved therapy for lung fibrosis. Esbriet is now a $1 billion/year drug and has already made over $6 billion in revenue. 

With a team that has over 70+ years of small molecule drug development experience, we intend to do the same with chronic liver diseases, which affects over 20 million Americans and represents a market size of over $30 billion. 

We know we are well positioned for success because we have shown excellent pre-clinical mouse data in several liver fibrosis models using our novel small molecule. We demonstrate a reduction in fibrosis with our drug, but more significantly, we show a reversal in fibrotic tissue back to normal tissue. 

With our current developmental strategy, we hope to have a clinic-ready compound by the end of 2021 and be in phase I clinical trials by mid of 2022.

name: Together
description:
Together is a dating community. Our app skips you from swipe to meetup - removing the lengthy process of messaging and scheduling. And, with a strong consent culture and referral-based community, we're the safest place to meet new partners and friends.

The team is Lauren Vegter and Aubrey Tull. Lauren spent 5 years at Facebook, most recently leading viral user growth for Instagram from 700M to past a billion users in two years. Aubrey has ten years of engineering experience from Stripe, Twilio, and Netflix.

name: Tienda Dolar
description:
Emerging Markets currency crisis frequently occur affecting local people and corporate savings capacity. Saving in hard currencies is a must. 

Tienda Dólar is a digital foreign exchange platform which allows users to convert ARS into USD and therefore protect people’s & corporate savings. 

We launched in May and we have already traded 26 MM USD and got 20.000 users with a monthly growth of 55%.

On average we make 0.5% per trade. Our market is 8.8 Bln in Latam.

One more exciting thing, we have signed a partnership with a wholesale bank. This partnership will allow for more savings protection alternatives (beyond hard currencies).

Platform success in Argentina has serve as a proof of concept. We look forward to expand into other EM countries and offer multiple product business lines including brokerage services and other simple investment solutions (i.e Mutual Funds).

name: Global Belly
description: Global Belly is a platform that helps influencers launch custom products and monetize their audience. They take care of technology, analytics and operations so that influencers can create and start selling their physical and virtual products in a matter of days. Global Belly has launched 15 influencers in the food space and shipped thousands of products nationwide. These influencers (chefs, bloggers and media personalities) have established authentic relationships with their audiences. One of their influencers is SweetAmbs, a professional cookie decorator, who has over 3M followers across social platforms. Global Belly helps her sell DIY kits, signature mixes, books, tutorials and classes. Global Belly's co-founders are Ankita Sharma and Madhuri Sharma (unrelated). Ankita has a Masters in Computer Science (Carnegie Mellon) and MBA (NYU Stern) and experience working at Apple and Bloomberg. Madhuri brings the culinary and content marketing skills to the team, with a B.S in Film & Television (Boston University), a Culinary Arts degree (Institute of Culinary Education) and experience at Grey Global Group and The Food Network.

name: Logarithm Labs
description:
We want to reduce schedule and failure risk in complex scientific and engineering development cycles (eg: semiconductors, automotive, avionics, bioinformatics etc). 

Our initial vertical is semiconductor chip design

We are developing a toolkit comprising (1) data pipelines, (2) scripting interfaces, and (3) portals and dashboards, to parse, structure, and analyze data generated during chip design experiments and correlate them with input data, simulation parameters, and configuration settings.

Using our toolkit, chip design teams can: 
1. Identify anomalies and outliers in experiments 
2. Perform actionable root cause analysis 
3. Make project health tracking data-driven with customizable reports

name: Blok
description: Fitness professionals have large, loyal followings, but don’t have the tools to build scalable businesses. Blok makes it easy for fitness professionals to teach live classes, sell content, get paid for differentiated services, partner with brands, reward their community, and build a unique brand online."Fitness entrepreneurs" will continue to unbundle from brands and will be armed with Blok's digital tools to monetize their audiences directly.

name: Talyn Air
description: Talyn is making long-range electric vertical take-off and landing (eVTOL) aircraft for passengers and cargo. While there are many other companies doing this that you may have heard of (Joby, Lilium, etc), they have a maximum achievable range of sub 100 miles. We have 3X the range at over 300 miles. We do this by making an electric fixed wing aircraft that is caught mid-air with a custom winged drone, enabling it to take-off and land vertically.

name: Zaam
description:
Zaam is an end-to-end SaaS solution for business onboarding. It provides:
(i) smart data entry form with real time validation 
(ii) automated individual and business checks 
(iii) case management dashboard with customizable rules

name: Trimwire
description: Trimwire helps fast growing companies visualize and control their subscriptions, ensuring compliance and cost savings.

name: TrueNorth
description:
Traditional trucking companies still run on paper, emails, phone calls, and snail mail. They’re inefficient and bloated. The pressure of low margins suffocates the truckers who actually do the work.

Our software cuts out the inefficiencies, and we pass the savings through to our truckers. Instead of paper-pushers and endless phone calls, they get an operating system: customer management, load coordination, automated invoicing, a real-time financial dashboard, a single place to manage their business.

A blog post that goes deeper into why we started this company: https://medium.com/@jinstedge/truenorth-b42437f1dc03

Our expertise: cofounders Sanjaya and Jin previously worked at an autonomous trucking company together. Jin also grew up in a family of independent truckers. Sanjaya built hardware & software systems at Altera, Quettra, SimilarWeb, and Scotty Labs; Jin studied Aerospace at MIT and helped scale Zenefits and Intercom.

name: Grain
description: Grain is a mobile app that transforms the debit card you already have into a credit card by linking it to a line of credit based on your cash flow. For the millennials, Gen Zs, and immigrants who are afraid of falling into crippling credit card debt, there is now a distinct market opportunity to offer an alternative to how these 100M people access and manage credit.

name: The Mercer Club
description: The Mercer Club is e-commerce's first-ever men’s rental service offering luxury and streetwear fashions at affordable pricing— think of it as Rent the Runway for men. Founded on the principle that fashion should be affordable and accessible, The Mercer Club aims to deliver an assortment of clothing, shoes and accessories to fulfill all a man's wardrobe needs, helping them stay on trend while considering their budget. Customers can rent pieces from well-known streetwear brands such as Yeezy, Nike and Supreme or luxury designers such as Gucci, Margiela, Acne and Balenciaga for as little as $25 a day or a monthly subscription for $75 a month. With the subscription plan, renters get 2 items at a time and swap out each week for another set of 2 items. The process is seamless from beginning to end— after placing an order, items arrive in 2-3 days in a custom box with a prepaid return shipping label. Our specialized team takes care of any laundering on your behalf and minor wear and tear is covered by us.

name: Benepass
description:
Benepass is an benefits card for modern companies.

We help companies take care of their employees through tax-advantaged benefits (e.g. FSA/HSA, dependent care, commuter) and company-funded stipends (e.g. wellness, WFH, professional development) all on a single card + mobile app.

With Benepass, HR teams can centralize all ancillary benefits and perks in the same place and make them a no-brainer for employees to use and engage with.

name: Eze
description:
Eze is a B2B Marketplace that connects telecommunication and global electronic wholesalers allowing them to trade devices in wholesale quantities with real-time market data. Our aim is to formalize the fragmented and inefficient second-hand electronics market that had an estimated beachhead of $17 billion in 2016 which grew 50% from 2015. (Deloitte)

Buyers and sellers use our platform to submit buy and sell requests. Eze automatically connects the two parties with compatible bids and executes the trade. The platform gives businesses real-time market prices and eliminates transaction risk by acting as an intermediary with a secure payment system.

name: Syndetic
description:
Companies that sell data need to do two things in addition to building their dataset:
1. Convey the meaning of their data
2. Convey its value

Achieving these two things is surprisingly difficult. The way this is done today is usually by providing a data dictionary that explains the structure of the data (field names, types, maybe a business definition), a sample set that’s relevant to the customer, and a bunch of ad hoc back and forth over email and phone.

Syndetic is a web app that sits on top of your datastore (or you can upload individual datasets as csvs). We scan the data to automatically generate profiling statistics like coverage rates, cardinality, min/max character ranges. We automatically generate sample sets. And we provide a management layer so teams can collaborate on field definitions, data lineage, and any other notes that may be useful to the buyer. The result is a nice looking webpage that we host with your domain (e.g. data.acmeco.com) that can be shared with potential customers, trade partners, or internally - anyone who needs to understand the meaning and value of a specific slice of data. You have full control over what gets published or not to your recipients.

Because we’re connected to the raw data, we can catch things like schema changes and alert you, so your data dictionary never gets out of date. If you want, we can even deliver the data for you to your customers via hosted SFTP, API, or direct database connection.

name: Edlyft
description:
Edlyft is a paid support program and platform for college students in STEM. Edlyft helps college students through their toughest STEM classes, starting with computer science, by offering online group tutoring, study groups, and content on navigating computer science. 

Before Edlyft, Arnelle worked as an engineer at Google, a product manager at startup Lark Health, and then spent a year and a half solving complex strategy problems for Fortune 500 companies at Bain. Erika has consumer and digital educational experience as an engineer at Facebook and a product manager for LinkedIn Learning.

name: Terusama
description: We streamline yard ops, provide richer insights, and save facilities money through gate/check-in automation, improving the trucker experience along the way.

name: Openbase
description:
There are millions of open-source packages out there, and developers often spend hours researching and evaluating competing packages to find the right one.
Openbase is the first platform to offer user reviews for packages, powerful insights and categorization for open-source packages - so developers can choose the right package every time.

name: SINAI
BaseDash
description: BaseDash is an internal tool tool that lets companies edit data straight from their production database with the ease of a spreadsheet. It’s like being able to use Airtable as an admin panel to manage internal operations.

name: Datasaur
description:
Datasaur builds intelligent, optimized, human-centric data labeling tools. If you're still using Excel or maintaining your own in-house tools, Datasaur can offer you significant cost-savings and improve the quality of your training data. We provide tools custom-built for power users. Our built-in intelligence helps augment your human labelers and avoid costly mistakes; our workforce management tool allows you to assign projects to and cross-validate the results from multiple labelers to ensure you can train your models with the utmost confidence.

I have 10 years of consumer product experience. I'd be happy to help discuss product strategy and gamification.
I'd love to get any advice you have to offer on SaaS and enterprise sales.

name: HYPHY
description:
What kind of content — Think photos and videos that you’d see on Snapchat, Instagram or TikTok.

For creators — Open your camera roll. Tap the photos and videos you want to sell. Get paid when your content is used. 

For brands — Download the media you like and use it in your campaigns.

Why This Works — Brennan built the creative tools for brands at Snapchat. While building the tools, he discovered what really works. There's a misconception that super polished content drives sales. In fact, the opposite is true. Brands that use organic media have to spend 1/3rd of what they normally do to see the same results. We improved another company's CPA from $74 to $13.

name: Exosonic, Inc.
description: Exosonic is developing the world's first quiet supersonic passenger jets that can fly overland without creating a loud boom. This aircraft flies at Mach 1.8 and carries 50 - 70 passengers up to 5000 nmi (think SFO - JFK < 3 hours). Our team is experience in supersonic aircraft design. Norris used to work at the famed Lockheed Martin Skunk Works on NASA's low boom supersonic test vehicle as a propulsion engineer before getting his MBA fro Stanford. Tim has his PhD from Stanford in aircraft conceptual design tools, studying under Prof. Alonso. We're always on the look out for capital and good aerospace engineering talent.

name: H1
description: H1 helps connect the healthcare ecosystem by providing a global platform of every healthcare professional and healthcare organization.

name: nextmv
description:
We believe that algorithms should be like any other software. You shouldn’t need a 🧙to automate delivery routes or a 👨‍🔬️to build a shift scheduler. We give developers the legos to make and experiment with decision models without a PhD.

We are for companies that need to scale and optimize their operations.

With us, developers can...
🚌Build a model to dynamically route buses based on passenger requests.
📉Build a model to minimize shipping cost for packages.
📆 Build a model to schedule workers based on demand forecasts.

name: 1build
description: 1build  uses machine intelligence to convert building blueprints into material shopping lists and cost estimates. It is a critical pain point for 3.2 mln builders in the US. In the process, we are creating an algorithmic data-driven approach that enables humans and machines to collaborate on building design and construction.

name: ditto
description: Manage the words across your team’s product from design to production.

name: Cyberdontics
description: Cyberdontics is building robots to automate dentistry, starting with dental crowns.  Dental crowns are one of the longest, most frequent and most expensive dental procedures. We take this 2 hour, 2 visit procedure and will do a better job in 15minutes.  8x faster than the average dentist.

name: Jamiphy
description:
Jamiphy is the destination for live music. All you have to do is watch, engage with what you like, skip what you don't, and you'll find an endless stream of live music that feels personalized just for you.

We make it easy for you to discover and create your own live music videos by providing easy-to-use tools to view and capture your greatest musical moments. Take your videos to the next level with Jamiphy!

name: Brokrete
description: We match contractors with nearby available suppliers with the best prices and best service. Yes - Like Uber, but for the most used product on the planet, concrete.

name: OpenUnit
description:
OpenUnit is the all-in-one platform self-storage facilities need to run their business - whether they’re a single mom-and-pop site or a multi-facility corporation.
