rct is a creative studio harnessing cutting-edge technology to offer a fully immersive, movie-like experience that transforms a traditionally passive audience into an interactive participant and driving narrative force. Founded in 2018, rct locates in Los Angeles and Beijing. 2019 rct studio joined Y Combinator - the biggest incubator worldwide - and selected the TOP 9 favorite startups by Techcrunch.
Most of rct studio’s team of eight were founding or core members of raven tech, which was acquired by Baidu, China’s biggest search engine, as the leading component to of its their smart hardware division.

name: Prometheus
description: A new way to make zero-net-carbon gasoline and jet fuel that can compete with fossil fuels on price

name: Career Karma
description:
Helps job training programs find qualified applicants.

We're starting with coding bootcamps. They pay us ~$1,000 per placement.

375 Million people will switch careers by 2030 and we are focused on the 16 million Americans who enroll in trade schools every year.

name: Truora
description:
Truora provides safe and reliable background checks and fraud prevention services for Latin America, through APIs and web service solutions. 

We operate in 6 countries (Mexico, Colombia, Peru, Costa Rica, Brazil and Chile)  and are expanding rapidly. 

Our customers include Latam's top martketplaces (i.e. Didi, Rappi, Liftit), FinTech startups, Large financial institutions and large HR firms as well. 
Our software allows for: background check verifications, continuous identity verification, digital identity solutions, OCR technologies and document authentication, KYC solutions and biometric validations. 

Our team is composed of 4 founders with expertise in the security and fraud prevention, as well as 60+ expert software engineers. We have offices across Latam, with our tech teams based in Colombia.

name: Withfriends
description: Withfriends makes it easy for any small business to offer memberships, so that your community can subscribe to support your business. Simply connect us to your online store or point-of-sale, and we'll offer memberships to your customers during checkout. We've found 1 in 20 customers will choose to become members, bringing your business an additional 45% in revenue.

name: Cosmic
description:
Cosmic is a headless CMS and API toolkit to help teams build modern apps faster, together. We provide a web dashboard to create content and API tools to deliver content into any website or app.

Teams benefit from using Cosmic JS because it eliminates the need to build and maintain their own CMS infrastructure. Teams pay a monthly subscription fee for our hosted CMS and can focus on what really matters in their application, great content and user experiences.

name: Habitat Logistics
description:
Habitat delivers on behalf of restaurants, regardless of how the end-customer chooses to place an order. 
Without us, restaurants are faced with the challenge of managing their own delivery staff or sacrifice their customer base and profit margins to the UberEats and Postmates of the world. We charge restaurants a fixed fee per delivery and allow them to request a delivery at any time, thus giving restaurants margin control and the ability to unlock inbound demand.

name: VertoFX
description:
VertoFX helps businesses of any size make international payments safely, simply and timely. 

By connecting Businesses, Liquidity providers, FX Brokers, and Payment Institutions, and banks through our marketplace, companies can choose their foreign exchange rates at the time that suits them, therefore, providing a constant liquidity flow cheaply.

name: Tailor-ED
description: TailorED is an AI-powered personalized instruction platform for the whole child that enables teachers to reach every student - independent of technology. With the help of TailorED, teachers can easily create differentiated lesson plans that dynamically groups their students based on their whole child needs and provides the most effective activities tailored to the needs of each group.

name: WorkClout
description:
WorkClout is enabling industrial labor to perform to their highest potential. 

WorkClout is a tool that helps industrial Operations & HR Teams make better decisions to improve production efficiency. WorkClout's SaaS tool centralizes on-the-job employee training, troubleshooting, safety/quality procedures, knowledge building, and performance tracking.

name: Inito
description:
Fertility Clinics basically do 3 things. Hormone tests, use that data to diagnose & treat conditions and perform procedures like IVF & IUI. Inito brings the first two right on your phone. Inito plugs on your phone and measures fertility hormones. Our App looks at the trends of these hormones and helps you get pregnant faster.
We’re already shipping and will make $60,000 this month - which is a 2x growth in the last three months. We have a 40% margin on hardware and by this summer, it will become 65%. 
Right now we measure two hormones - Estrogen & LH and use them to predict ovulation. We have 8 more blood and urine hormone tests in the pipeline which will allow us to do most of what the Fertility Clinics do.
We are going after the $30B fertility clinic market. And we have something that no fertility clinic has - Data. Our users have already taken 50,000 tests using Inito. As this data grows, we can diagnose conditions months even before a couple goes to go to a fertility clinic and way better than them.
We are engineers from IIT and worked at Siemens building medical products. We have 7 granted patents and 10 publications on areas directly related to Inito’s technology.

name: Globe
description: globe is a derivative exchange that connects funds, brokerages and retail traders across Asia with sophisticated institutional market markers in a fashion similar to robinhood

name: VotingWorks
description:
VotingWorks is a non-partisan non-profit founded on the powerful idea that the operating system of our democracy should be publicly owned. Every citizen’s vote is sacred, and every citizen deserves evidence that our elections are free and fair.

Forty states use voting machines that are over ten years old. Their technology is outdated, their source code proprietary and their security vulnerabilities – described in detail by the security community over many years – are left unpatched. It’s not surprising that 76% of voters are concerned that our elections are vulnerable to hacking. And if voters lose trust in elections, then the very foundation of our democracy is at risk.

We’re using open-source software, off-the-shelf hardware, and modern product engineering to make elections dramatically safer, more accessible, and more affordable. Affordability may sound pedestrian, but it is key. The front line of America’s election security rests in the hands of the 50% of US counties that struggle to afford basic services, let alone upgrade aging voting equipment.

name: Allure Systems
description:
AllureSystems uses A.I. to create stunning apparel images for eCommerce. Allure works with leading fashion retailers to improve conversion rates by creating images that resonate with their clients in a scalable and cost effective way. 
Basically, with a single photo of a clothing,  a brand can produce unlimited images, on any model, instantly.  The ability to show  styles on models in every size increases conversion rates and wow the customers. Without needing models on-site, brands can produce images for their product page at scale.

name: Mars Auto
description: Mars Auto is building autonomous trucks to completely automate long-haul truck operations.

name: Dockup
description: Dockup gives on-demand environments for engineering teams so they can merge pull requests with confidence. It works like CircleCI, but allows you to manually test and see each code changes in action with your entire tech stack without having to mock any of your services.

name: Cuanto
description:
We allow Latin American small businesses and independent entrepreneurs to create their online store in their mobile without any technical knowledge so they can sell over social media in minutes.

E-commerce in Latin America is mobile and social-media centric. We are building the platform to massively accelerate this transition.

name: Pronto
description:
PRONTO is the first RIDE-SHARING + DELIVERY platform for SECOND-TIER cities in LATAM. 

In second-tier cities all transactions are paid with cash, this is why the Uber model doesn´t work (since they have to collect their revenue from commissions). We solved this by creating a subscription model where drivers pay a monthly recurring subscription of 59 to 99 USD depending on their monthly revenue. This also generates a higher LTV with low CAC as well as high engagement and fidelity ratios.

Traction: Since our launch, we have achieved over 2,000,000 processed trips with more than 200,000 users, we bootstrapped until we achieved half a million trips and entered YC.

Market Size: There are over 14,000 second-tier cities in LATAM, with more than 500 million people without any access to ride-sharing or technology platforms at all.

name: AXDRAFT
description:
AXDRAFT analyzes patterns in your legal documents and transforms drafting process from erroneous and time consuming copy and paste to a mistake-free simple Q&A. The average time to draft a document with AXDRAFT is less than 4 minutes.

On top of this AXDRAFT allows to integrate data into the document from public registers and your internal databases, eliminating the need to double check every data input.

Data validation, e-signatures, access control, document id, visibility and personal accountability for drafted documents. All of this is possible with AXDRAFT.

45 corporations using AXDRAFT reduce time spent on drafting legal documents by up to 90% and shorten their approval cycles by up to 4 days.

Both of these improvements mean more deals and better financial results for your company every quarter.

And the best part is that from the moment we sign the contract AXDRAFT can be up and running in 2 weeks.

Few case studies are available here: https://www.axdraft.com/customers

name: Pulse Active Stations Network
description: Pulse Active Stations is a connected network of smart health kiosks in India. In just one year, over 157,000 people have paid to test their vital signs like heart rate, BMI, body composition and other vitals at our kiosks. We're growing organically at 30% month over month. The majority of Indians do not have access to basic health screening. By locating our kiosks in public spaces like train stations and malls, Pulse Active Stations is the first point of contact that 1.4 billion Indians will have with healthcare services.

name: Cityfurnish
description: Cityfurnish is a rental subscription service for furniture and appliances in India. Today, there are 350M people renting unfurnished or semi-furnished apartments in India; Cityfurnish provides an easy, affordable and hassle-free solution. The founding team shares 25+ years of furniture retailing experience and has grown the business to 8,000+ subscribers.

name: Glide
description:
Glide is a web-based app builder that allows non-programmers to quickly create fully-functional, great-looking apps by combining prebuilt components with a familiar spreadsheet model.

App development has barely changed in 30 years. Glide will bring app development out of the Dark Ages, making it web-based, collaborative, and fun. Think of Google Docs or Figma but for building apps.

We believe that almost all apps can be built 10-100x faster, with higher quality, by starting with the data model and generating a polished app from high-level components that users customize.

Our mission is to make it easy and fun for anyone to build amazing apps without code. In ten years, we want the majority of apps worldwide to have been built with Glide.

We're four technical founders with expertise in native mobile frameworks, developer tools, and product design. We've worked together for 5-10 years, and were all early employees at Xamarin, a mobile developer tools startup acquired by Microsoft in 2016.

name: Emi Labs
description:
Emi Labs is an Enterprise SaaS startup. Emi is a conversational AI platform for HR teams. It leverages AI to shorten hiring cycles, to eliminate low-value-added tasks and to increase recruiter productivity while giving the candidate a better experience, improving the company’s brand as an employer.

Some of their customers include Burger King, Starbucks, 7-Eleven, Danone, PwC, or BBVA.

name: Bentocart
description: Bentocart is a hotspot-based delivery network for perishables. By asking customers to meet at a hotspot, we unlock merchant selection to be virtually the entire city for them, and through this model we can fulfill the last-mile delivery at 1/10 the cost.

name: Wallets
description: Wallets Africa is a borderless digital bank for Africa. By placing a large emphasis on providing a seamless experience to users and building on new payments infrastructure, we are building a platform that makes it easier for people - Africans and foreigners - to spend locally across the continent without having to create an account with a local bank.

name: MyScoot
description:
MyScoot is a marketplace platform to discover social experiences where you meet new people & make meaningful connections. You can either attend interest-based experiences or host one to earn money while building your micro-community and having fun. It can be used to find new friends, look for dates, or network for your business.

We're a team of 3 co-founders who have expertise in business strategy, product, operations, and marketing/growth (for marketplaces). Looking to add some dynamic engineering team members.

name: Keynua
description: Keynua is an E-sign platform that uses short video signatures which serve both to approve specific documents and provide the visual identity of the signatory, which is then confirmed using official records and social network profiles. All transactions are "notarized" on the Blockchain. Keynua stores encrypted versions of the identities of all signatories so that users may reuse them with other companies affiliated to the Keynua platform.

name: Edyst
description:
Edyst is a Y Combinator-funded company (W19) working in the online learning & employability space. We’re looking to collaborate with people who want to significantly change the current learning and employability system in India.

In a span of 2 years, we have hit some pretty impressive figures that some of the most established names haven’t:

- Our course completion rates are more than 80% (8x the industry average)
- Students spend an average of 95 minutes daily on the platform (5x the industry average)
- 50% placement ratio (2x the industry average)

We need more mavericks for this journey: people who love challenges & puzzles; people who love to learn & grow; people who want to significantly change the current learning and employability system.

name: Beacons
description: We help content creators build mobile websites for their businesses.

name: AccioJob
description:
Hi YC people!

AccioJob is a college job board in India where universities sign up to expose their students to the best companies. Companies are able to hire fresh talent from universities, saving them time, money and enabling them to hire better talent from a larger set of applicants. We eliminate the need for companies to physically visit campuses for hiring. 

Most students in India currently are forced to choose from a handful of job options that visit their campus. We are building this to enable students from all colleges to have a fairer shot at any company they wish to apply to.

If you or anyone you know are looking to hire grads from India, feel free to contact us at founders@acciojob.com


Website Link: www.acciojob.com

name: Shiok Meats
description: Shiok Meats is a cell-based clean meat company, exclusively working on seafood. Shiok Meats is the first cell-based meat company in Singapore and SE Asia and we employ cellular agriculture to grow seafood meat in the laboratory using cells instead of animals. Shiok in Singapore English slang means fantastic and enjoyable. Our meats are animal-, health- and environment-friendly with the same taste, texture and nutrients, but no cruelty. Our mission is to bring delicious and healthy meat by harvesting from cells instead of animals.

name: Zippi
description:
Access to credit is extremely scarce for the 40m gig economy workers in Brazil and in
many other emerging economies. Volatile earnings and a work history that is difficult to access mean that these individuals cannot even apply for loans within most financial institutions and online lenders. When faced with emergencies or financial difficulties, gig workers struggle to find reliable alternatives.

Zippi solves that by building financial products tailored to gig workers. Our first product, a credit card for gig workers, is the first in Brazil to match workers' cash flows, giving customers much better control over their spending.

name: Seawise Capital
description: Seawise Capital is a trade finance company for Indian exporters. We provide SME's working capital against the strength of their international customers. We are able to provide these businesses with collateral-free capital by discounting invoices from their large overseas customers.

name: Nowports
description: Nowports is the first digital Freight Forwarder shipping ocean containers to and from Latin America. One out of every two containers gets lost or delayed due to miscommunication and lack of management. The platform reduces human mistakes to 0% and saves up to 40% of delays with Nowports models and algorithms. Nowports assist companies so moving ocean containers is fast, simple and secure.

name: NALA
description:
Hi YC, 

I'm excited to share with you about NALA (https://www.nala.money), an application that simplifies the process of making mobile payments for our users in Africa. 

As you may know, the way that mobile payments are made in many developing markets is quite different from how they're made in the rest of the world. In much of Sub-Saharan Africa, people make payments using mobile money, an electronic wallet service that is typically tied to a user's cell phone carrier and sim card. Using a 39-46 digit sequence of short codes (i.e. dialing a code such as 150*30*1331, waiting for a screen to pop-up, dialing another code and waiting for that screen, repeat, etc.) that are received by the user's cell phone carrier, a user can request to send money to a friend, pay a bill, or purchase airtime all without being connected to the internet and accessible via smartphone and basic feature phone alike. (M-Pesa, which you may have heard of, is just one of the many such mobile money services offered in Sub-Saharan Africa).

While mobile money has undoubtedly transformed the way that millions of people transact, the process of executing a mobile money payment is time-consuming, arduous, and prone to error, resulting in a less than ideal transactor experience. After moving back to my home country of Tanzania in 2017 and conducting 700+ on-the-ground interviews, Sam and I founded NALA, the first internet-free mobile money smartphone application. NALA interfaces with existing mobile money providers (M-Pesa, Airtel, tiGO etc.), and provides users with a simple Venmo-like payment experience. To deliver this capability, NALA has built a USSD automator tool to send requests over existing USSD channels.

Our product serves as a central platform where users can initialize payments for all of their mobile money accounts (having multiple sim cards and mobile money accounts is extremely common in Sub-Saharan Africa as inter-network transaction fees are lower than out-of-network fees), and for the first time ever, access their transaction histories through our rich transaction tool. While we will make a percentage cut for every bill payment and airtime top-up that is conducted on our platform, we are primarily focused on growing our active user-base.

As Sub-Saharan Africa mobile money usage proliferates ($860+ million in daily transaction values and close to 400 million mobile money accounts), smartphone penetration approaches 40%, and the fastest growing middle class of any continent comes into its own, we believe there is massive potential to transform and shape the African payment space. Building a product that thoughtfully addresses our users' financial challenges is what excites and energizes us. The pernicious transaction fees that mobile money users are subject to is an area of particular interest and focus.

We would love to hear about YC ideas and experiences in this space, feel free to ping by email: founders@nala.money

name: Mudrex
description:
Mudrex is on a mission to bring risk optimised high yield investments to everyone.

Sophisticated high yield investments like hedge funds have been accessible only to richest. With a novel approach, we help average investors invest like a hedge fund.

name: Skill-lync
description: Skill-Lync provides job leading engineering education online. We started with a special focus in Mechanical, Electrical, Electronics & Civil engineering and have become one of the world's leading & highest rated platforms in teaching high-end technical skills that help students get a job.

name: Endpoint Health
description: The first targeted therapeutics company focused on integrated solutions for critical illnesses, Endpoint Health combines novel and on-market therapeutics, companion diagnostics, and artificial intelligence into an integrated platform designed to improve outcomes in critically ill patients.

name: AmpUp
description:
90% of electric vehicle charging happen at home. That's not only because current early adopters have the luxury of space and resources to have home charging, it's also that people are avoiding public charging intentionally. Public charging is fragmented with too many networks each requiring their own way to access AND there's no way to guarantee a spot, so you find yourself hustling like a startup founder just to charge your car.
ampUp has built a smart scheduling service that enables ad hoc and reserved charging on any charger; whether it's a home charger on a private driveway or chargers part of a public network. We aggregate all this info in the ampUp mobile app for EV drivers to easily access and anyone or entity that wants to share their chargers with the neighborhood. 
ampUp with its hardware partners also provide a small community charging solution that's a mini version of ampUp. Chargers can have dynamic access and charging rate and all the data are for the customer to see and keep.

name: XGenomes
description: At XGenomes, we are building a technology comprising novel biochemistry, hardware and  algorithms for sequencing DNA. Our product will be streamlined: there is zero library preparation;  we sequence directly on unadulterated single molecules of DNA; DNA extraction will be integrated with sequencing; there is no bioinformatics bottleneck. The sequence we produce will be of unprecedented accuracy due to several layers of in-built redundancy including the sequencing both strands of the double-helix concurrently. The sequence we produce will be complete, encompassing: structural as well as single nucleotide variants; long-range haplotype phase; the repetitive "dark matter" of the genome. The cost of goods (consumables) of sequencing will be <$10, which will allow us to price our product at a level that will help grow the market while still achieving >90% margin. We will start by offering access as a service to high value customers, which be followed by a razor and blade model of selling instruments and consumables.

name: Alpaca
description:
We are building a stock brokerage service dedicated for trading bots and developers. On the Alpaca platform, we provide real-time market data, unlimited paper-trading API, and commission-free trading API through a FINRA member Alpaca Securities LLC.

As tech startup persons, we are all pretty familiar with coding even if your role is not a developer. Our kind of people continue to increase through coding schools and coding education, however, there is no investing/trading portal for us to freely interact with the financial market as we can do with other types of the data.

I (Yoshi) have a good understanding of securities regulation and broker-dealer formation. I also know a lot about securitization in general after spending 7 years on Wallstreet including Lehman Brothers securitization team. Hitoshi (CTO) is an expert in database technology and has been an active PostgreSQL OSS contributor.

name: Upsolve
description: Upsolve aims to rehabilitate the 20M low-income people in America buried in debt from medical bills, job loss, and payday loans. Upsolve does this through the first TurboTax for bankruptcy. Bankruptcy is a lifeline for low-income people, but it's impossible for millions to access because they can't afford $2,000 for a lawyer. Last year, Upsolve was awarded the New York Times Good Tech Award for relieving over $13M in debt. Existing funders include Eric Schmidt, Jim Breyer, Y Combinator, Harvard, and the Robin Hood Foundation.

name: Our World in Data
description:
Poverty, disease, hunger, climate change, war, existential risks, and inequality: The world faces many great and terrifying problems. It is these large problems that our work at Our World in Data focuses on.

Our World in Data publishes an open-access publication where users can understand the state of the world today, where we are making progress and where we are falling behind. Through interactive data visualizations we can see how the world has changed; by summarizing the scientific literature we can understand why. We cover everything from global poverty to natural disasters, education and health; we have 3405 charts across 297 topics.

Our World in Data is free, open-source and provided as a public good. It has millions of users every month, and is cited in research and media across the world every day. This allows millions of people to understand the large problems the world is facing, and how we can solve them.

name: Traverse Technologies
description:
Where are the best places in the world to build a wind farm or a hydropower dam? 

Traverse is an AI driven professional engineering firm focused on answering these types of questions.

We use AI, high performance computing and automation to speed up traditional prospecting, feasibility assessment and front end engineering work by 10x. Traverse can prospect for exceptionally high ROI project configurations across entire countries and also optimize the returns of individual projects amongst billions of potential permutations, helping our customers eliminate development risks dramatically.

name: SleepWell.ai
description: We guide people through their unique sleep optimization journey.

name: Heart Aerospace
description:
Heart makes electric airplanes. We’re based in Sweden, and we’re developing a 19-passenger aircraft (EASA CS-23/FAA Part 23 certifiable). The plane will have an all-electric range of 250 miles and a backup generator for reserves and range extension. 

We have signed LOIs with Scandinavian Airlines SAS (the biggest airline in northern Europe), BRA and Wideroe for 86+ planes.

name: JetPack Aviation
description: Our focus is on developing the smallest and fastest VTOL vehicles possible.  Our vehicles can be operated in urban environments with no risk of rotor strikes - we don't use rotor systems!

name: Wanderlog
description:
Today, travelers (1) already write down their trip plans onto Google Docs and Google Sheets and (2) ask friends for advice on where to go on trips. Travelchime is a better place for travelers to write down their trip plans, and to plan travel based on your friends' trips.

Imagine a document where you can type in a place, and we'll bring up a map, opening hours, and ratings. We use machine learning to parse thousands of blogs for the most popular places, so you can plan your trip without having to read them all. Once you're done planning, your plans become the basis for your friends' future plans, fueling our growth. We monetize using affiliate ads.

Wanderlog is live at https://wanderlog.com - try it out!

name: Aura Vision
description: Aura Vision is like Google Analytics for physical stores. We help retailers make more sales, brands to really understand their consumers, and commercial spaces to better utilise their real-estate. Our proprietary deep learning video AI tracks visitor demographics, movement and engagement from existing security cameras.

name: AIRx Health
description: AI driven tech/service to remotely monitor patients with chronic lung disease, centered around predicting/preventing COPD flares/hospitalizations.

name: Cocoon
description: Cocoon actively brings your most important groups closer together. It provides a private space to gather, the tools you need to keep each other close, and helps you keep writing your ongoing story as a unit.

name: Wren
description: With Wren, anyone can offset their carbon footprint by supporting sustainable agriculture and reforestation projects. We also show users how they can reduce their carbon footprint. We make it easy for anyone to turn climate confusion into climate action.

name: CareerTu
description:
CareerTu is an online school focusing on digital marketing, data analytics, and product design. We teach our students with real-world business problems via capstone projects to make sure they are equipped with the must-have technical skills. 
 
In 2019, 100+ companies hired CareerTu students in the US and China including  Amazon, Facebook, Microsoft, Pinterest, Carat, LVMH, Universal Studios, Expedia, Fitch Ratings, Wipro, IRI, Siemens, Verizon, Capital One etc.
 
We’d love to help you to fuel your business growth by engaging with high potential hard-working early talents!

name: Ravn
description:
Ravn is a DefenseTech company building a heads-up display for soldiers that will allow them to see around corners. In doing so, we allow them to see the enemy and react while they're still behind cover. Our lightweight heads-up display displays videos feeds from a camera on a gun, to drones, robots or other external platforms. Our heads-up display will become a soldier's most relied upon computer.

We currently have four team members, all very experienced in their respective fields. Jake, the Founder, is a former Navy SEAL and understands the market and product. Our Chief Science Officer, Karl Guttag, is an industry leader in the optics and display space. Our VPs of Software and Hardware are both very experienced in their fields. Our primary technology focus is on peer-to-peer applications, near eye optics and displays, cameras/sensors/IoT, and UI/UX (hardware and software).

name: Doppler
description: Doppler helps your team manage software secrets through a streamlined secrets manager. Works on every stack both locally and in production. Effortlessly scales with you as your team and products grow.

name: Deel
description: Deel is the first payroll platform for remote teams (contractors & full time employees) that connects localized compliance and payments in one system of record and automates everything.

name: Pyxai
description:
Talent Acquisition: By screening all applicants, Pyxai helps companies eliminate unintended biases in the hiring process and identifies talent that would otherwise be overlooked. Pyxai screens every applicant with open-ended, situational judgement tests and provide a report back to the recruiter. Identifying and extracting soft skills like communication, critical thinking, and grit provides holistic insight into an applicant and is a better indicator of long-term job success. 
Talent Development: Soft skills and culture evaluations produces gap analysis that are supported with personalized soft skill micro-lessons - to strengthen individuals in your organization.

We work with leading soft skill psychologists and years of research data to power our models. 

More than ever, the human and emotional quotients are playing a key role in organizations and we aim to enhance the human edge with soft skills.

name: Qwest
description:
Qwest is a marketplace for individuals to connect with like-minded people while accessing popular places and events through joining social clubs. 

We provide a platform for social clubs to build, engage, grow and sell memberships. We help social clubs provide perks to their community like skip lines, table access, free entry and universal access to other clubs. 

We help creatives, entrepreneurs, and professionals find community while conveniently going out to popular events, bars, clubs, and lounges

name: Intact Therapeutics
description: Intatct is developing an advanced materials platform to improve the way drugs are delivered and absorbed in the digestive tract. Our vision is to improve the treatment of a wide range of gastrointestinal disorders that are currently underserved.

name: Mobot
description: Mobot is an on demand testing platform - powered by computer vision and a fleet of robots - for mobile apps on actual devices. We help organizations in a range of industries, including mobile and e-commerce, IoT, medical devices and digital health with automated functional testing of their mobile products and connected peripherals. We give these organizations the accurate results they need to identify issues across a spectrum of mobile devices and operating systems.

name: AuroraQ
description: At AuroraQ, we are building the world’s first truly practical quantum computing system.  This system integrates together different quantum components, each performing different functions with the data, including processing, communication, and memory.  Integration of different specialized components that efficiently work together to complete the calculation is precisely how classical computers work.  No other quantum hardware company has yet tackled the integration challenge.  AuroraQ will be the Dell of quantum computing, sourcing components from our partners to build a better quantum computer.

name: Handle.com
description:
Handle is construction software that helps contractors and suppliers and solve two giant issues within the industry: late payments and access to capital.

Our software automation tools help with manual and repetitive tasks associated with late payments such as document management, payment deadline tracking, and online mailing. While our financing tools offer options such as material trade credit, mechanic's lien purchasing, invoice factoring, and more.

name: Maitian.ai
description: Open, grab-n-go marketplace powered by computer vision. We invite partners like chained restaurants to run most of the logistics. By giving them more customers, we get a cut of each sale ;)

name: Supernova
description:
Supernova automates development of mobile applications by converting designs (in Sketch, Figma etc.) to actual production-ready code for iOS, Android, React Native and Flutter. We do this by analyzing the underlying design file, learning all we can about it, optimizing it (the design in its raw form is absolutely not usable for mobile apps) and converting layer by layer to a product that can be developed. 

The conversion a semi-automatic process, where the designer says what each element should represent - for example saying that "this" layer is a button, and Supernova converts all the design information to the actual button. By doing this, Supernova effectively automates the creation of the entire front end, except for a few minor things like very custom components, which are not yet possible. 

Supernova is also full-fledged prototyping tool, is it is possible to create animations, navigation chains, even automatically localize to 30 languages. We also have a second service - Supernova Cloud, which will launch in the start of February.

name: Askdata
description:
Askdata lets users interact with data through natural language. 

1. Users can connect their Apps and Data.
2. Start making questions like "Show me revenue for 2018"
3. Receive personalized data insights.

name: Okteto
description: Kubernetes is fast becoming the standard for deployment, scaling, and management of enterprise applications. But developers are struggling with this paradigm shift. Tech-savvy companies like Google, Shopify, Pinterest, and others are solving this by building internal platforms. Okteto is building the Kubernetes development platform for the rest of us.

name: Atomic Alchemy
description:
Atomic Alchemy is building a bank of research-grade (15 MW) reactors to produce the nuclear material that goes into nuclear medicine. Radiopharmaceuticals are vitally important in biological tracers, diagnostic imaging, and cancer treatments.

Reactors are versatile machines, enabling secondary revenue streams such as: neutron transmutation doping of silicon (making silicon a better semiconductor); and neutron activation analysis, an analytical technique for measuring elemental compositions, to name a couple.

name: Switchboard
description: Switchboard finds commercial trucks to move freight. Switchboard uses real-time data obtained by its devices installed on-board commercial vehicles to determine immediate truck availability, as opposed to the manual method of using email and phone calls done by traditional middlemen.

name: Visly
description: Visly is building a next generation design tool initially aimed at front-end engineers. We believe that with the proliferation if component driven software design and popularity of universal design systems it is the perfect time to build a tool like Visly. We enable engineers and designers to collaborate in a single tool and create high quality components that can be directly imported into code using existing tooling developers are used to. Compared to many other design tools we know that the secret to getting this to work well is building a tool engineers will love and building trust with the engineering community. Otherwise these components will never make it into a production code base.

name: Demodesk
description: Demodesk is an intelligent online meeting tool for sales/customer service professionals. We provide an interactive screen to easily demo/walk through products - no downloads/extensions  required. Because we are using virtual displays instead of sharing a local desktop screen, we can directly integrate sales assistance into the meeting flow and coach reps on the fly: Showing layovers on the sales rep’s side to guide him along the call, automatically load the right presentation content at the right time and provide real-time feedback on customer rapport.

name: Avo
description:
Avo – ship faster without compromising data quality.

**How does it work?**
Avo is the single source of truth for your tracking plan. Product managers suggest metrics and analytics events in the Avo web app. Data scientists and developers review and approve tracking changes. Developers generate type safe code to implement faster. Avo monitors your data so you know when it breaks.

Give your development team 90% of their time back, by automating the flows around planning and implementing analytics for every feature release.

name: InsideSherpa
description:
InsideSherpa is changing the world of career discovery and skill-building.

We partner with leading companies to create virtual experience programs for students to build skills, gain experience and better understand different career paths. Our free digital learning programs simulate a 'day in the life' of a junior employee, giving students the chance to complete hypothetical tasks, learn from employees and understand which roles are aligned with their interests and skills.

We believe 'talent is distributed evenly, but opportunity is not'. Our programs let companies open their doors to students from all backgrounds, regardless of where they are located, what they study and what university they go to.

There are now +200,000 students in the InsideSherpa community, and we currently run virtual programs with leading organizations including GE, BCG, Accenture, Latham & Watkins, JPMorgan Chase & Co, Citi, King & Wood Mallesons (commercial law), Ashurst, John Holland (engineering), BakerMckenzie, NSW Government, Linklaters, KPMG (data science), Deloitte (Technology Consulting), Commonwealth Bank (Technology), Pinsent Masons (Australia & UK), Sydney Romantics (fashion & design), ANZ (data analytics), McGrath Nicol (Restructuring & Technology), MinterEllison (commercial law), Monash University, Y-Combinator (How to work at a start-up), Grant Thornton (Audit), White & Case (USA & UK), Corrs Chambers Westgarth, Arnold Bloch Leibler and H2 Ventures (venture capital).

name: Nabis
description: Nabis ships cannabis products for brands to retailers.

name: Sapling Intelligence
description: Sapling sits on top of CRMs and messaging platforms to help agents more efficiently compose personalized responses. Managers gain conversational insights to coach and prepare teams.

name: WeatherCheck
description: WeatherChecks application tells anyone when severe hail is about to strike and when it has in fact impacted a property. Using state of the science technologies we compute and analyze geo-weather data faster than every weather company globally. This allows companies, insurance companies specifically to gain dynamic insight into their overall exposure and enabling them to respond more quickly and efficiently to disaster.

name: Hutsy
description:
Hutsy is a new way to buy a home for the modern home buyer.

For the first time, we’ve built a hybrid agent-tech process that will help you with your entire home buying process. We are committed to helping you from searching & submitting offers to signing closing documents in the simplest manner possible.

We find the best local agents, title officers, lenders, inspectors and streamline the process start-to-finish so that you don't have to worry about dealing with shady folks.

We've eliminated redundant back-and-forth so that you can search, schedule and sign easily online.

We give you a clean dashboard to keep track of any upcoming closing costs, and the transaction progress at all times, so that you can prepare for what is required of you well ahead of time.

Ultimately, we've retained the humanistic elements of the process, provided by the best agents and third parties, and fused it with the latest tech for your convenience. This means that you consistently get the best home buying experience, every single time.

name: COUTURME
description:
COUTURME is a personal fashion designer for formal dresses, starting with wedding gowns. This can be done quickly without expereinced designers and pattern makers, by utilizing patent-pending CAD software.

Customers can purchase bespoke special occasion dresses and wedding gowns that are personally designed for them, with formal dresses starting at $199 and wedding gowns starting at $699. 

The COUTURME experience begins with a personal consultation with a stylist. Afterwards, the stylist will generate 3 unique designs based on the submitted information. The customer responds with feedback, and the stylist recreates the design to reflect comments of the customer. 

While an overwhelming number of ready-to-wear fashion exists online, 80% of American women cannot fit into these standard-sized garments and the result is 50% of returns are made from online purchases. By providing custom designs in the precise measurements of the consumer, COUTURME solves this problem and provides them with the garment of their dreams perfectly fitted to their body.

name: GoLinks
description: GoLinks allows you to create internal links for your company that are so easy to remember and share, you don't have to bookmark or copy and paste them in emails. For example, teams use GoLinks to keep track of their dashboard at go/metrics or an employee directory at go/directory. These internal link systems have been a standard for productivity boost within companies like Google, Yahoo, Linkedin, Twitter, and Airbnb for years. GoLinks is the first company building this as a service for everyone else. 75% of all employees at all of our customers use GoLinks every single month.

name: Middesk
description:
Building trust between businesses is an important building block of the online economy. Today, there is no standardized way to verify the credentials of business entities at scale. 

Cleri is building APIs to verify and identify risk associated with business entities, such as bankruptcies, lawsuits, or liens, at scale.

name: LEAH Labs
description:
We are genome engineers, T cell biologists, clinical veterinary scientists, and entrepreneurs who are capitalizing on the genome writing revolution to bring cell therapies to canine oncology.

We are disrupting the static veterinary oncology market that is reliant on expensive, outdated, and ineffective chemotherapy. What we learn treating dogs will translate directly into human therapeutic strategies.

name: MedCrypt
description:
MedCrypt has developed a security toolkit that allows medical device developers to focus on diagnosing and treating disease, while ensuring their devices comply with security regulations and best practices. And since each installation of our software communicates with our MedCrypt network, we can use machine learning-based transaction monitoring algorithms to detect anomalous behavior, thwarting attacks in real time. This centralization of transaction data allows us to facilitate "Threat Sharing" between device vendors, helping build a community of device vendors offering the most secure devices possible.



MedCrypt protects medical devices against malicious hacking. Each installation of our software communicates with our MedCrypt network, allowing us to use machine learning-based transaction monitoring algorithms to detect anomalous behavior, thwarting attacks in real time. This centralization of transaction data allows us to facilitate "Threat Sharing" between device vendors, helping build a community of device vendors offering the most secure devices possible.


If someone hacks your connected thermostat, you’re uncomfortable. If someone hacks your pacemaker, you could be dead. MedCrypt is bringing modern software security technologies to an important, but underserved technology sector.

name: BrainKey
description: BrainKey offers the “BrainKey Scan” via our partners at MRI imaging facilities. The “BrainKey Scan” combines the power of high-resolution MRI and our AI in order to create a deep personal brain profile for our clients. This brain profile is used to establish a quantitative brain baseline that can be used to track brain changes and help identify and optimize treatment for present or future brain health issues.

name: Hatch
description: We are building a SMS business messaging platform for Small, Medium and Enterprise Brick and Mortar businesses to help them communicate both with customers and teams internally.

name: FLOWER CO.
description: FLOWER CO. Members pay $120/year to get access to prices that are 40% less than other retailers. We offer cannabis brands a turnkey D2C solution to power websites and delivery.

name: Postscript
description: We help brands engage with customers via text message. This includes marketing campaigns, automations, order follow-ups, and customer service.

name: Nebullam
description: Nebullam builds indoor farming equipment with a faster payback. Nebullam's growing equipment is designed to produce more food (lettuce, herbs, microgreens), while Nebullam's software automates the growing equipment, reducing onsite labor needs.

name: Windsor
description: Windsor lets companies explore their user data in realtime for analytics and customer support

name: PreFlight
description: PreFlight is automated software testing. Today, our customers can create tests with zero code or technical knowledge. Soon, they won’t need to create tests at all. They’ll install one line of code which will allow us to track all their users actions. We’ll use this data to create the largest and most robust tests which adapt to changes in your product. Our customers will never need to hire for QA.

name: Chaser
description: Update your Salesforce (or Gainsight/Totango) records directly from Slack. Never trade off between spending time updating records and spending it with customers.

name: Nettrons
description: Nettrons is an AI Talent Sourcer who sends you 10 strong candidates per role everyday based on automatically captured culture fit and high-level filters like "3+ years rails experience", "worked at fintech startups".

name: Convictional
description: Say Allbirds or General Mills need a way to sell to their retail customers. We provide the tools and support that allow them to sell to any retailer, large or small, from one order system.

name: Green Energy Exchange
description: The Green Energy Exchange delivers affordable renewable energy direct to homes and businesses.  The company offers the most affordable green energy plans in the market and is dedicated to increasing the demand for renewable energy by offering to clean energy at affordable prices.  By removing middleman and inefficiencies we can provide lower prices to consumers, higher revenues to generators and help increase the adoption of clean energy sources.  Empowering people to buy renewable energy at great prices will help move us to a cleaner and greener future.  We are a licensed retail electric provider and operate in Texas currently.

name: Spire Law
description: Spire Law defends businesses and business owners from lawsuits.

name: Comradery
description: A customizable community platform that allows companies to easily create and foster an active and engaged community

name: Ultralight
description:
We are building a cross-platform, lightweight, high-performance, GPU-accelerated renderer for HTML/JS/CSS with aims to become the dominant platform for all mobile and desktop apps.

Our solution allows developers to write desktop and mobile app frontends in HTML/JS/CSS while still retaining the speed and memory advantages of native apps.

We have experience in C++, JavaScript, OpenGL, Direct3D, Metal, layout engines (WebKit/Chromium/Gecko), library development, development tools licensing, game development, and HTML UI.

We may need help with business development, enterprise licensing, beta testing, and mobile development.

name: Kalshi
description:
Kalshi (www.kalshi.com) is an exchange where people can bet on anything with anyone. It can be on questions like: 
- "Will Brexit happen by the end of the month?"
- "Will it rain in NYC tomorrow?".  

We built Kalshi because we believe that people should be able to capitalize on what they know and have opinions on. We make this possible by expanding what people can trade and get exposure on and allowing them trade in the domain of everyday knowledge. 

Kalshi is developing a new asset class, “event contracts,” and a financial exchange for trading on the outcome of events: we are on track to be federally regulated by the CFTC as the first-ever legal futures exchange in the U.S. for trading on a broad category of events.

name: Pengram
description: Pengram is an indoor navigation application to allow anyone to map a building using just a phone and set up waypoints. Anyone can navigate in the building through Pengram to established waypoints. We primarily focus on helping fire protection, HVAC, and security technicians to locate devices scattered in a building during field work.

name: Kopa
description:
Kopa is the marketplace for furnished housing and compatible housemates.

We believe that exploration and community make people whole.
Kopa exists to inspire people to get out of their comfort zones, to form lasting relationships, and to live more fulfilled lives.

Kopa enables people to browse furnished rentals, find housemates with similar interests and lifestyles, choose beds, and split deposit and rent payments.

name: Keeper Tax
description: Keeper automatically finds tax write offs for contractors. We do this by searching through your bank statements. Sit back, relax, and let us find you thousands of dollars in tax write offs most people miss.

name: InterPrime
description: InterPrime helps companies boost the yield on their "idle cash" by helping them invest in ultra short term U.S. Treasury Bills. As you know the big companies like Apple, Google etc. have dedicated internal teams that manage their cash in this manner. We allow customers to specify their liquidity needs and then we create the appropriate bond ladders to maximize the yield on their capital (currently ~2.25+% APY after fees). The capital & government securities are always in the company's name, client assets are never pooled, and clients can access these funds within 2 business days without any penalties or fees.

name: Pachama
description: We use AI and satellites to validate and monitor forest restoration and conservation efforts, removing carbon and solving climate change.

name: AllSome
description:
AllSome is a platform that connects modern e-commerce sellers to distributed spare warehouses to perform cross border e-commerce fulfillment in a painless way. We have established a network of 250 warehouses in China, Malaysia and US. We manage to help e-commerce sellers to perform quality check in China, repack based on branding requirement and ship to worldwide. 
We are a team with cross border, supply chain & logistic and e-commerce background. 
We are looking for partnership to reach more brands who need quality and personalized e-commerce fulfillment.

name: The Juggernaut
description: The Juggernaut is a NY-based subscription media company and community for the South Asia-curious. Targeted subscription media is a valuable bet: Black Entertainment Television (BET) sold to Viacom for $2.3b in 2000 and Liberty Media valued Univision at $14b in 2017. The U.S. South Asia diaspora alone has $460b of spending power and is the fastest growing demographic in the U.S., yet is underserved. We're backed by some incredible investors, including Precursor Ventures (also in The Athletic, Superhuman), Kevin Lin (co-founder, Twitch), Adam Hansmann (co-founder, The Athletic), and Balaji Srinivasan (ex-Coinbase CTO, ex-GP a16z).

name: Geosite
description:
**GENERAL**
Geosite is an enterprise SaaS platform for spatial data. Through pairing a marketplace with integrated data management and collaboration tools, Geosite enables customers to leverage spatial data for more rapid and accurate planning and operations. This platform is a dual use technology for both commercial and military customers.

//

**SPACE PEOPLE**
Geosite is a cloud-based platform creating a comprehensive repository of geospatial data, such as satellite imagery, through the aggregation of public and commercially available data, providing market-wide ability to rapidly search, select, purchase, assemble, and manage data sets. This will not only create the most comprehensive and exhaustive marketplace for geospatial data and analytics, but also build the underlying data infrastructure for the geospatial industry. This marketplace, for both analytics and data, will enable customers from Oil and Gas companies to US Special Operations to access and consume data from many sources for greater operational efficiency and safety. 

//

**O&G PEOPLE**
Geosite is a data platform for Oil and Gas companies that allows customers to bring together their data for a clearer picture of the world. Over 80% of information has a spatial component to it, rarely is this being leveraged to add to the bottom line for Oil and Gas companies. With the proliferation of satellites and distributed sensors (IOT), we are at a juncture of immense opportunity for Oil and Gas exploration to reach an operational efficiency that was impossible only a few years ago. Geosite allows for cutting edge logistics planning and operational tracking to increase safety and productivity.

name: Rent The Backyard
description: Rent the Backyard helps you earn cash renting out an apartment in your backyard. We help you through the entire process. From financing and permitting, to construction and renting the unit, we'll make it easy to make money from your backyard.

name: Eatgeek
description: We connect restaurant applications to drive more orders and better customer experiences. The typical restaurant now uses more than two dozen different applications to run their business and we connect them. Specifically, we focus on data aggregation, customer attribution, and workflow automation. Our customers include brands like Frank Pepe’s, Halal Guys, and more.

name: Flockjay
description:
Flockjay retrains jobseekers from non-traditional and underrepresented backgrounds to significantly increase their income and get future-proof tech sales jobs. We provide job-ready tech skills, make warm introductions to leading tech companies, and grant support well after graduates are hired. Our live, online program is $0-upfront and debt-free.

Our mission is to empower upward mobility through education and access.

name: Trexo Robotics
description: Trexo Robotics is building wearable robotic legs to help people walk, starting with childing with Cerebral Palsy. Our product allows children with disabilities like Cerebral Palsy, to walk, in many cases for the first time in their lives. Trexo was started when Manmeet found that his nephew was born with Cerebral Palsy and would never be able to walk. They are already commercial with customers all over US and Canada. Their vision is to replace the wheelchair, for children, adults, and the elderly.

name: Woody Library
description: We are Netflix for physical books in China.

name: Overview
description: Overview makes camera based monitoring, quality, and analytics products for factory and industrial settings. These allow you to continuously count, analyze, record, and search anything on your production line or in your factory. Overview uses easily installed cameras with AI recognition software to observe objects, events, and sequences and learns to recognize anomalies. These tools can be used for operational analytics, realtime fault notification, and traceability. Overview’s cameras can be passively set up above existing lines or other trafficked areas in factories.

name: BillionToOne
description: Our mission is to make prenatal testing safe and affordable for every expecting mother. More than 3,000,000 babies are born with serious genetic defects, majority in developing countries. Our novel technology can detect even single-gene disorders such as thalassemia through a simple blood test. We are replacing amniocentesis, an invasive and risky procedure that has a high miscarriage risk, with a safe and affordable blood test, starting with developing countries.

name: HeyDoctor
description:
Waiting rooms suck. Insurance and the paperwork are worse. We are a team of doctors, developers, lawyers, designers, and more working to try to fix it. Using our app, and soon the website, you can access medical care online right now and be done in 5 minutes. No insurance, video, or phone calls necessary and most visits are under $20. You can chat with your doctor anytime and anywhere.

Our services are currently available in Arizona, California, Connecticut, Florida, Georgia, Illinois, Montana, New York, Ohio, Pennsylvania, Rhode Island, Virginia and Washington, but don't worry the rest of the country coming soon. Here are the medical services we offer so far:

-   Acne Diagnosis, Treatment, and Prevention
-   High Cholesterol (Lipid) Testing and Treatment
-   Start or Refill Birth Control
-   Urinary Tract Infection (UTI) Testing and Treatment
-   Vitamin D Screening and Treatment
-   Pre-Diabetes Screening and Referral
-   Hepatitis C Screening and Referral
-   Female Condom Prescription
-   Help Quitting Smoking
-   Find Out Your Blood Type

We are adding new services every week, so if you don't see what you need let us know. We want HeyDoctor and our partner health systems to be your first stop for healthcare and be your personal medical record.

name: CSPA
description:
The Computer Science Proficiency Assessment (CSPA™) is a comprehensive standardized exam for software engineers. The CSPA assesses your technical knowledge, skills, and abilities across a broad array of topics.  We write the CSPA exam questions, software engineers take the test, and we share the results with employers and schools.

MARKETING & SALES:
We actively find software engineers to take our test, whether direct or through partnerships.  On the other side, we actively partner with employers looking to hire.

PRODUCT:
We build the exam content manage system, a proctoring framework, and autograding system, as well as a SaaS employer product to browse the candidate database.

name: Look After My Bills
description: Look After My Bills is a new auto-switching service making sure you're always on the best possible energy deal.

name: Medumo
description:
We’re a group of Harvard and Yale-trained physicians, engineers, designers, and social entrepreneurs who came together to transform care delivery.

Medumo’s CareTours™ enable healthcare organizations to effectively provide turn-by-turn guidance to patients without disrupting workflow by utilizing automated, precisely-timed messages sent via text and email. 

- Dramatically improve procedural completion rate
- Increase referral conversion
- Reduce staff burden 
- Recover revenue loss 

Want to get started in automating patient navigation for your Hospital, ASC, or Practice? We serve all specialties. Reach out to our leadership team for a brief chat or full presentation. 

Bob Smith - Director Strategic Partnerships 
Bob@medumo.com
Cell # is 502-744-2911  EST

name: Hunter2
description: Hunter2 teaches modern appsec to engineering teams through interactive labs. Developers get hands-on practice exploiting and patching real web apps written in their tech stack.

name: Edwin
description:
It combines the latest adaptive learning and Natural Language Understanding technology with pedagogical content as well as on-demand human instructors to offer its students affordable, personalized, 1:1 learning. Based in San Francisco, the company was funded by General Catalyst, Y Combinator, Google Assistant Investments Program, and several other investors. Over 800 thousand students have improved their English with Edwin.

In early 2020 Edwin merged with MyBuddy.ai. The resulting company kept the name “MyBuddy.ai”. Headquartered in San Francisco, it focuses on building a virtual English conversation partner for over 500 million children around the globe who are trying to learn English, but can't reach fluency because they lack genuine practice speaking the language. The company doubled down on its mobile app Buddy, the voice-based English tutor for kids, organically combining solutions developed by MyBuddy.ai and Edwin.

name: Flinto
description: Send money to friends, pay at merchants, and take care of your bills through your phone, even without a bank account.

name: ClearBrain
description:
ClearBrain (YC W18) is a startup building the first self-serve AI platform for growth marketing.

We help companies automatically predict and retarget users when they are most likely to purchase. Fortune 1000 companies use ClearBrain’s automated machine learning platform to personalize experiences for hundreds of millions of user predictions - as effectively as Uber or Google.

We’re led by the founding engineers of Google Ads and Optimizely’s data infrastructure teams, and backed by investors in Dropbox, Optimizely, and AdMob. We’re a deeply technical team who value humility and customer empathy above all. As a group we’re also pretty good at bowling, D&D, and Rubik’s cubes.

We are building an advanced analytics platform with the challenge of making it accessible to a smart, capable clientele of growth experts that demands ease of use, utility, high availability and good responsiveness. You’ll join a startup environment where you'll be exposed to a variety of backend, frontend, machine learning frameworks in a fast-moving company!

name: VIDA & Co.
description:
VIDA is the story of the rich, beautiful, interconnected world in which we live. It is the story of contemporary life and of mindful, global citizenship.

VIDA is a collaboration amongst global citizens - from a designer in Milan, to a producer in Karachi, and a consumer in San Francisco – we are a global partnership of co-creators.

VIDA presents an alternative to the homogeneous, disposable products that increasingly dominate retail. We produce only that which is purchased, bringing into the world only items that are wanted.

We are using innovations in design and technology to make quality accessible again. We produce with the highest ethical standards, respecting the makers of the products we bring into our lives.

We believe beautiful products should create beauty every step of the way.

name: disclosures.io
description:
Every year $1.2 trillion in residential home sales are exchanged, however buying and selling a house is still a huge, painful process. Maybe that’s because Real Estate is the least digital industry, behind only agriculture 🐮 . 

Disclosures.io is on a mission to make the real estate process more transparent and efficient for everyone involved. Our product helps sellers get their home to market faster and enables buyers to make more informed offers. 

We believe in lean, pragmatic product development, entrepreneurship and building a business that we are proud to be a part of. We love talking to like-minded makers, drop us a line!

name: Lyrebird
description: Lyrebird offers a new generation of speech synthesis technologies for developers. It is the result of several months of research conducted at the MILA lab at University of Montréal.

name: Opearlo
description: Opearlo builds voice apps for Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant.

name: Surematics
description: Surematics is helping commercial insurance brokers structure complicated deals online. Homeowners and car insurance are enough of a nightmare for most of us to handle but Surematics is targeting even more difficult cases — awkward expensive items like oil rigs. With a dash of blockchain, the startup wants to allow companies to collaborate together to create enforceable contracts.

name: Meetingbird
description:
Meetingbird is the calendar with superpowers. Individuals and teams from companies like Uber, Shopify, and Yelp use Meetingbird to make their meetings great.

See what Meetingbird can do for you at meetingbird.com.

name: Escher Reality
description: The most advanced Augmented Reality API.

name: CarDash
description:
Taking care of your car doesn’t need to be a painful or archaic experience. CarDash picks up your car from home or work, oversees the work, and returns your car to you. We also offer upfront and transparent pricing and serve as your advocate so you are never overcharged. 

We are on the verge of a major transformation in our relationship with the automobile. Connected cars, self-driving cars, mainstream electric vehicles, and new economic models of car ownership are all coming within the next decade. These could bring about a transportation revolution as disruptive as the adoption of the automobile itself. We don’t know how or when these changes will unfold, nor do we know which technologies will triumph. We do however know that all cars on the road will need to be serviced, regardless of who owns them, who drives them, or what powers them. 

By leveraging technology, logistical efficiency, and above all — superior service, CarDash aspires to become the service platform for the automotive industry of tomorrow.

name: Audm
description: Audm is a mobile app that turns long-form print journalism into professionally narrated digital audio. The app, which was quietly launched on 2016, uses professional voice actors to read news content that makes it enjoyable to listen to.

name: Py
description:
Py is democratizing access to career opportunities in tech. Our iOS and Android apps have been featured in the App Store & Google Play Store and we've provided millions of lessons and quizzes to our users. We are changing the way that educational content is delivered and modernizing traditional online teaching tools.

We launched Py for Work to level the playing field for candidates and empower companies to take a skills-based approach to hiring. Our platform enables companies to assess candidates using real-world assessments, not brain teasers. We’re helping industry leaders like LiveRamp, Amplitude, and Factual approach hiring based on merit, not resume keywords.

name: Terark
description: Terark built a new storage engine for Database and Data Systems. Our technology enables direct search on highly compressed data, with 200X faster read performance and more than 10X storage savings (better than Google's LevelDB, Facebook's RocksDB), getting larger scalability with lower cost for big data applications. Alibaba is our paying customer, and we are a YCombinator company.

name: ZipX
description:
We are a group of expats in Hong Kong that want easy and affordable access to buy the products we love from back home. Snacks, foods, health products, and other daily essentials that we miss are either not found in Hong Kong, or are too expensive to buy. We were faced with bad alternatives such as overpriced grocery stores, or expensive package forwarding companies.

We believe that with the help of technology, anyone should be able to buy anything from around the world at an affordable price. We are on a mission to make international commerce seamless.

name: Tetra
description: Tetra uses AI to take notes on phone calls, to help you focus, remember the details, and keep your team in sync.

name: Supr Daily
description:
Supr Daily is a daily milk delivery service in India.

SuprDaily is a daily subscription brand for needs like milk, bread, eggs, coconut water, etc. Manage all your daily needs at one place with the convenience of a smartphone.

name: Hivy
description:
Hivy is a task management tool for office operations teams and helpdesk system for employees. The platform enables office managers to collect employee requests, manage projects, assign tasks and notify employees when their requests have been completed.

Hivy was acquired by Managed by Q in 2017.

name: Penny
description:
Penny is a personal finance app that helps you track your income and spending.

Penny accesses your statement history—with your permission—and uses that information to help you manage your finances. Whenever you open the app, she’ll chat with you about your finances: letting you know how you’re doing this month, forecasting where you’ll be next month, giving you a heads up about upcoming bills, or even helping you cancel services you don’t use.

Penny makes finances less intimidating and stressful. Many apps have lots of useful features, but they’re often hard to use and time-consuming. Penny automatically organizes your finances, explains them simply and clearly, and tells you what you need to know, when you need to know it.

name: Wavy
description: Wavy is a simple, modern and mobile app that accompanies everyday beauty craftsmen. It facilitates the digital transition of professionals imposed by the digital age and new regulations. If you know a salon or institute manager, give him the word: "Simplify your life, manage your hair salon or beauty salon with Wavy!" Wavy offers two offers to accompany the manager in his missions and save him time. 1- The management offer, on the one hand, makes it possible to manage the establishment of the collection to the management. Connected to a tablet and a cash drawer design, the Wavy app is suitable for beauty trades. Planning, customer records, cashing, inventory management, statistics, accounting, the team and the manager take all in hand quickly. Available on iPhone and iPad, the show can be managed remotely with the Internet or 4G! The data is secure and the financial reports are sent to the accountant in one click. 2- On the other hand, the Communication offer, helps to attract and retain customers. Many hairdressers dream of a website in their own image and a Facebook page updated weekly, emailings and sms targeted to retain, the Wavy app does for them, from writing messages to sending. Fewer calls and more appointments with online booking: 45% of appointments are made outside opening hours, a real need for hairdressers and their customers! name: Fiix
description:
Fiix offers auto repair services for its clients.

The company offers on-demand auto repair services in terms of battery, brakes, diagnostics, inspections, doors, windows, engines, exhaust systems, filters, fluids, fuel systems, heating, lights, sensors, suspension, steering, tires, and transmission. The company offers auto repair services at its clients' homes or offices.

Fiix was founded in 2015 by Zain Manji and Arif Bhanji and is based in Ontario.

name: Scaphold.io
description: Scaphold is the world's most powerful GraphQL as a service platform. The platform will provide a number of services including push notifications, analytics, file storage, custom code, multiple environments, and more to allow developers to build mobile, web, and IOT applications. Our innovative use of GraphQL is the big game changer here. We’re convinced that it’s the future of APIs and we want to make it readily accessible to everyone else.

name: Scribe
description:
Scribe is an AI-Powered Sales Assistant for your inside sales team, that you can hire in <10 minutes. 

Scribe magically finds the best prospects, writes highly personalized emails, handles objections and schedules demos with pre-qualified leads. To put it into perspective, our customers have been able to get 3X the number of qualified meetings for 50% of the cost, and your SDRs can now focus on only the warmest leads. 

Scribe is backed by Y Combinator and other elite Silicon Valley investors and is fundamentally transforming sales. Email me at rutika.muchhala@tryscribe.com to learn more!

name: Clear Genetics
description: Clear Genetics is developing innovative, patient-centric software to thoughtfully integrate genetics into routine patient care. Our HIPAA-compliant platform offers an automated and comprehensive solution to deliver genetic services at scale. Clear Genetics serves leading health systems, clinics and commercial labs across the nation.

name: The Buttermilk Company
description: The Buttermilk Company is a direct-to-consumer business focused on bringing authentic and simple recipes from different cuisines to an American audience. We curate recipes from the local community and create packets filled with real, fresh ingredients and no preservatives. You can make a homemade meal in 5 minutes! We also give back a portion of our sales to the people who gave us the recipes.

name: Grabb-It
description: Social network, email aggregator

name: Mylk Guys
description:
We are a national vegan specialty store. Starting with food, we are expanding to other categories like beauty, healthcare, home goods etc. 
We use data to predict which products will succeed (and launch them exclusively)

name: Passenger AI
description: Software for robotaxi operations.

name: Hexel
description: Hexel lets you create a cryptocurrency for your community.

name: Point API
description:
Point stores things you send over and over again and helps you re-use them instantly.

Point can store ANYTHING, including long email templates, links, images, and emojis! When you want to re-send your pitch, support ticket resolution, or even just a Calendly link, Point makes it easy to find and reuse it so you never have to type it out again.

No need to search for your favorite emoticon anymore...¯\_(ツ)_/¯

Install our Chrome Extension to use Point anywhere on the web: https://pointapi.com/chrome.

name: Iambiq Technologies
description: We help organizations read and process large amounts of text-based data usually handled by humans.

name: Hopper
description:
Hopper is a mobile-only company that uses big data to predict and analyze airfare and accommodations. The app provides travelers with the information they need to get the best deals on flights and hotels, and notifies them when prices are at their predicted lowest points. 

Since launching in 2015, Hopper has become one of the fastest growing travel apps ever with nearly 20 million installs. It is #1 travel app in over 37 countries and ranks as one of the top 10 travel apps in over 95 countries. Our users have tracked 45 million trips since launch and are booking $1.5 million worth of travel through the app each day. Hopper has received accolades such as Apple's App Store Best of 2015, the Google Play Award for Standout Startup of 2016, and the Webby Award for Best Travel app. 

Hopper was founded in 2007 and has $104 million CAD in funding to date from Caisse de dépôt et placement du Québec (CDPQ), Accomplice, Brightspark, OMERS, BDC IT Venture Fund, and Investissement Québec.

name: Pagedraw
description:
Pagedraw turns UI drawings into code, bringing your app's look to life, and ready to deploy to production 

Our mission is to make programming more powerful.

name: Nutrigene
description:
Our mission is to optimize health and prevent nutrition-related disease, which affects over half of the world’s population. Current supplement solutions are ineffective and inconvenient. Dried pills lack potency while liquid vitamins quickly degrade - neither form gives your body specifically what it needs to perform. 

Nutrigene helps you optimize your health - by sending you pure, personalized liquid supplements. Pick a goal, fill out our metabolic assessment, and we will optimize your supplements based on scientific research to create unique formulations are 10x more effective than generic off the shelf pill-based formulations.

name: Psylaris
description:
We empower mental healthcare clients with virtual reality sessions that are additive to traditional therapy. Clients regain their self-reliance the moment they are given the chance to contribute to their treatment. Therapists can focus on the aspects of treatment that e-health is not equiped to deal with. Treatment efficiency goes up - costs go down: 
E-health the way it was meant to be.

name: Heyday Health
description: We put a professional nutrition coach in your pocket. You send meal pics through WhatsApp and a coach will give you feedback and correct meal choices in a non-judgemental way.

name: miru
description: Miru is an augmented reality app that shows you what any piece of furniture will look like in your home. We use a computer vision pipeline to create an augmented reality experience for furniture from any retailer's website so you can see what the coffee table you love will look like in your home.

name: Obsidian Labs
description: Obsidian Labs focus on building blockchain products and developer tools for dApp ecosystem. We have released Secrypto, an EOS dApp store and multi-chain wallet on iOS and Android, and EOS Studio, a graphic IDE for EOS dApp development.

name: OurMenu
description:
